translation.key: "Well... you're just a kid. You need to take care of yourself. If somebody bullies you, you come back and let me know."
translation.value: "好吧... 你还是个孩子. 你得先关心你自己. 如果有人欺负了你, 回来告诉我."

translation.key: [p]Sheila rests a hand on your shoulder tenderly; you can't help but shed a single tear. All of the suffering and fear you have hidden deep within yourself suddenly leaps to the surface.
translation.value: [p]Sheila温柔地将一只手放在你身上; 你忍不住流下了一滴眼泪,隐藏在你内心深处的所有痛苦和恐惧突然浮出水面.

translation.key: [bot_10]"I think that's enough for the day. Everyone is exhausted. You'll still have to say something eventually, but for now, let's all get some rest."
translation.value: [bot_10]"我认为今天十分充盈. 每个人都筋疲力尽. 你好像要说什么事情, 但现在，我们得先休息一下."

translation.key: "If you need to talk..." Since the spirit appeared, it seems that everyone wants to chat. However, after what happened with Brian, you are fearful of what the future will bring.
translation.value: "如果你需要聊天..." 在精灵出现之后, 似乎每个人都想要聊天. 然而, Brian的事情令你为自己的未来担忧.

translation.key: [p]You hang you head and release a soft sigh. <player> continues speaking as if it understands how you feel.
translation.value: [p] 你垂下头, 发出一声轻叹. <player> 继续说话就好像它理解你的感受。

translation.key: "I'm Otohime, an Eidolon. We exist everywhere you are and everywhere you are not, and I hide within the transforming power of your spirit."
translation.value: "我是Otohime, 一个幻灵. 我们存在于任何地方, 而我隐藏在你精神的转化力量中."

translation.key: "They say we are the very origin of life, that we connect you with Gaia..."
translation.value: "他们说我们是生命的起源, 我们将你与Gaia联系起来..."

translation.key: [p]Otohime's words render you speechless. Gaia is a name you've heard in legends since childhood. At least it isn't more talk of an evil spirit or a curse.
translation.value: [p]Otohime的话让你无言以对. Gaia是你从小就在传说中听到的名字, 至少它不是更多人讨论的恶灵或诅咒.

translation.key: "Right now, I grow with the power of your spirit. But if your spirit gets weak and frail, darkness can devour you, just as it did Brian. You'll lose yourself; evil will distort your mind."
translation.value: "现在, 我随着你精神的力量成长. 但如果你的精神变得虚弱和虚弱, 黑暗就会吞噬你, 就像Brian一样. 你就会迷失自己; 邪恶会扭曲你的思想."

translation.key: [bot_12]"Dad! <player> is a good person! You're just going to send my hero away?"
translation.value: [bot_12]"爸爸! <player> 是个好人! 你是要把我的英雄送走吗?"

translation.key: "<player>, did you get a good night's sleep?"
translation.value: "<player>, 晚上睡得好吗?"

translation.key: [p]You tell Sheila that you have decided to leave the village, and you plan to find a way to separate from your spirit, even if you have to travel to the ends of Earth.
translation.value: [p]你告诉Sheila你已经决定离开村庄, 你想找到个方法去与你的灵魂分离, 即使你必须前往遥远的地方.

translation.key: "I thought you might come to that conclusion. There's nothing I can really say now that you've made up your mind."
translation.value: "我认为你既然会得出这个结论, 而现在你已经下定决心了, 我没有任何事情要和你交代了."

translation.key: [bot_12]"Dad, Brian... he's not... he's transformed... I was so scared..."
translation.value: [bot_12]"爸爸, Brian... 他不是Brian了... 他变了... 我很害怕..."

translation.key: "You've really decided to leave?" Anita peers at you curiously.
translation.value: "你真的决定离开了?" Anita好奇的看着你.

translation.key: [p]You nod.
translation.value: [p]你点点头.

translation.key: [bot_10]"<player>, we know you are a true warrior. If you have a problem, you can let us know. You needn't bear the entire burden yourself."
translation.value: [bot_10]"<player>, 我们都知道你是一个真正的战士, 如果你有任何困难都可以告诉我们, 你不必自己承担."

translation.key: "Are you really leaving today? I thought you'd stay for a few more days." There is an edge of sadness to Betsy's smile.
translation.value: "你今天真的要走吗? 我以为你会多待几天." Betsy的笑容里带着一丝悲伤.

translation.key: "I truly believe you will succeed. You're different from Brian. I know it in my very soul." Betsy nods with affirmation.
translation.value: "我相信你会成功的. 你和Brian不一样. 我心里知道这一点." Betsy肯定地点点头.

translation.key: "Go ahead! Experience the brilliant journey of life and be sure to tell everyone about the wonders of Port Skandia! We could use some tourist money."
translation.value: "继续前进! 体验人生的辉煌旅程, 一定要告诉大家Skandia港口的华丽! 我们可以使用一些旅游资金."

translation.key: [p]York stares at you as the other look on in silence. You will need a convincing explanation about everything that has happened.
translation.value: [p]York盯着你, 别人沉默地看着你. 你需要对发生的一切进行令人信服的解释.

translation.key: "Such confounded..."
translation.value: "如此令人困惑..."

translation.key: "<player>, what are you doing here? It's dangerous out here, so just go on back to the village..." Kane spots the creature next to you, staggering back with surprise.
translation.value: "<player>, what are you doing here? It's dangerous out here, so just go on back to the village..." Kane spots the creature next to you, staggering back with surprise.

translation.key: "<player>... you've got a monster on your back, eh? Are you bound by a curse, too?" Kane keeps one hand on his weapon as he sizes you up.
translation.value: "<player>... you've got a monster on your back, eh? Are you bound by a curse, too?" Kane keeps one hand on his weapon as he sizes you up.

translation.key: [p]Kane's words pain you; you have to find Brian and ask him to clarify the situation. You hope Kane can tell you where Brian is.
translation.value: [p]Kane's words pain you; you have to find Brian and ask him to clarify the situation. You hope Kane can tell you where Brian is.

translation.key: "Brian took the Villager Chief's son, Joel. When we tried to save the boy, a black panther attacked us. They're hiding in the cave now."
translation.value: "Brian took the Villager Chief's son, Joel. When we tried to save the boy, a black panther attacked us. They're hiding in the cave now."

translation.key: [p]You tell Kane that the creature with you might have something to do with Brian, hoping he'll allow you into the cave to find Brian. You have to find a way to rescue Joel!
translation.value: [p]You tell Kane that the creature with you might have something to do with Brian, hoping he'll allow you into the cave to find Brian. You have to find a way to rescue Joel!

translation.key: "I don't know what to do. You two are both cursed by spirits, so perhaps you are bound together somehow... Hopefully, through Brian, you can save yourself."
translation.value: "I don't know what to do. You two are both cursed by spirits, so perhaps you are bound together somehow... Hopefully, through Brian, you can save yourself."

translation.key: "Joel, are you okay? Are you hurt?" York examines the boy frantically, searching for wounds.
translation.value: "Joel, are you okay? Are you hurt?" York examines the boy frantically, searching for wounds.

translation.key: "It's just better this way..."
translation.value: "It's just better this way..."

translation.key: [bot_38]"Ugh, why does stuff like this always happen to me?" he groans with a heavy sigh.
translation.value: [bot_38]"Ugh, why does stuff like this always happen to me?" he groans with a heavy sigh.

translation.key: [bot_38]"Brian, Brian... oh, yeah, the crazy jerk who broke my wagon, right? He smacked me! With his hand!" Larry whines.
translation.value: [bot_38]"Brian, Brian... oh, yeah, the crazy jerk who broke my wagon, right? He smacked me! With his hand!" Larry whines.

translation.key: "But I did say I'd try to help you, and I'm a man of my word. I'll think of a way to get you out of your pickle." Luther strokes his chin, thinking.
translation.value: "But I did say I'd try to help you, and I'm a man of my word. I'll think of a way to get you out of your pickle." Luther strokes his chin, thinking.

translation.key: "Mom, Dad, why are you looking at <player> that way? This hero saved me from a serious baddie. Without my savior, I would never have seen you again."
translation.value: "Mom, Dad, why are you looking at <player> that way? This hero saved me from a serious baddie. Without my savior, I would never have seen you again."

translation.key: [bot_16]"Joel... Dad just thinks..." York sighs. You see a tinge of fear in his eyes.
translation.value: [bot_16]"Joel... Dad just thinks..." York sighs. You see a tinge of fear in his eyes.

translation.key: [bot_10]"Joel, we know. But there are still a couple of things we have to figure out..."
translation.value: [bot_10]"Joel, we know. But there are still a couple of things we have to figure out..."

translation.key: "Are you okay? Did you find any clues from Brian?" Elena looks at you anxiously.
translation.value: "Are you okay? Did you find any clues from Brian?" Elena looks at you anxiously.

translation.key: [p]You tell Elena what Brian said and ask her if the same thing will happen to you. Will you become a bloodthirsty, savage monster, too?
translation.value: [p]You tell Elena what Brian said and ask her if the same thing will happen to you. Will you become a bloodthirsty, savage monster, too?

translation.key: "I... I have no idea. I really am sorry. I just can't say." Elena sighs regrettably.
translation.value: "I... I have no idea. I really am sorry. I just can't say." Elena sighs regrettably.

translation.key: "Chief York! <player> shouldn't stay in Port Skandia. Nobody can guarantee this freak won't go crazy. For everyone's safety, <player> should leave."
translation.value: "Chief York! <player> shouldn't stay in Port Skandia. Nobody can guarantee this freak won't go crazy. For everyone's safety, <player> should leave."

translation.key: [bot_10]"Kane! Bite your tongue!"
translation.value: [bot_10]"Kane! Bite your tongue!"

translation.key: "No, not at all! Selena is a wonderful, beautiful girl. I... I've actually always liked her..."
translation.value: "No, not at all! Selena is a wonderful, beautiful girl. I... I've actually always liked her..."

translation.key: "I have more important matter to attend to right now, and you're not a resident of this town. Why should I give you the Starlight Treasure Chest?"
translation.value: "I have more important matter to attend to right now, and you're not a resident of this town. Why should I give you the Starlight Treasure Chest?"

translation.key: Center
translation.value: 中心

translation.key: Madeline closes her eyes for a moment, sighing deeply. "We're still missing half. What are we going to do? Why can't Selena understand?"
translation.value: Madeline closes her eyes for a moment, sighing deeply. "We're still missing half. What are we going to do? Why can't Selena understand?"

translation.key: "You don't look too good. I guess she didn't have the time to solve your problem, eh?"
translation.value: "You don't look too good. I guess she didn't have the time to solve your problem, eh?"

translation.key: "What? You don't know? Well, what can I do? I need to be compensated for this!" Larry roars, frustrated.
translation.value: "What? You don't know? Well, what can I do? I need to be compensated for this!" Larry roars, frustrated.

translation.key: "Maybe..." His eyes light up. You lean in eagerly.
translation.value: "Maybe..." His eyes light up. You lean in eagerly.

translation.key: "This protection money issue is really putting pressure on the Town Mayor. If you can help her out, I bet she'd be willing to help you, too."
translation.value: "This protection money issue is really putting pressure on the Town Mayor. If you can help her out, I bet she'd be willing to help you, too."

translation.key: "As far as I know, the pirates are demanding, among other things, the fruit that grows on the Helonia Coast. It's quite famous. It's Selena's favorite." Luther blushes scarlet.
translation.value: "As far as I know, the pirates are demanding, among other things, the fruit that grows on the Helonia Coast. It's quite famous. It's Selena's favorite." Luther blushes scarlet.

translation.key: [eidolon]"Who's Selena? And why does she make you so nervous?" <eidolon> pipes up.
translation.value: [eidolon]"Who's Selena? And why does she make you so nervous?" <eidolon> pipes up.

translation.key: "Um, Selena is the Town Mayor's daughter. We grew up together." Luther smoothes his hair, clearly flustered.
translation.value: "Um, Selena is the Town Mayor's daughter. We grew up together." Luther smoothes his hair, clearly flustered.

translation.key: [eidolon]"Your pulse has quickened. That's what happens when humans feel the emotion known as 'fear.' Is this Selena a wretched monster of some kind?"
translation.value: [eidolon]"Your pulse has quickened. That's what happens when humans feel the emotion known as 'fear.' Is this Selena a wretched monster of some kind?"

translation.key: [p]You force a friendly smile and greet Madeline, then ask about borrowing the treasure chest.
translation.value: [p]You force a friendly smile and greet Madeline, then ask about borrowing the treasure chest.

translation.key: "I haven't the energy to think about anything else. Dealing with these Pirates is no easy task."
translation.value: "I haven't the energy to think about anything else. Dealing with these Pirates is no easy task."

translation.key: "Helonia didn't produce enough fruit this year. I don't know what to do."
translation.value: "Helonia didn't produce enough fruit this year. I don't know what to do."

translation.key: "The problems seem insurmountable. Not only do we have a severe shortage, but the Tanuki outside the village keep disrupting the villagers with their incessant fighting."
translation.value: "The problems seem insurmountable. Not only do we have a severe shortage, but the Tanuki outside the village keep disrupting the villagers with their incessant fighting."

translation.key: [p]You place the pile of collected fruit in front of Madeline.
translation.value: [p]You place the pile of collected fruit in front of Madeline.

translation.key: Madeline raises a surprised eyebrow. She cocks her head, staring at you.
translation.value: Madeline raises a surprised eyebrow. She cocks her head, staring at you.

translation.key: "If there's nothing else I can help you with, you should probably go."
translation.value: "If there's nothing else I can help you with, you should probably go."

translation.key: [p]If what the creature says is true, you could follow the same path as Brian, and because of that, you have no choice but to leave the village.
translation.value: [p]If what the creature says is true, you could follow the same path as Brian, and because of that, you have no choice but to leave the village.

translation.key: "Am I lying? You saw what became of Brian. How can I be sure the same won't happen to <player>? Anyone under the curse should leave for the good of our village!"
translation.value: "Am I lying? You saw what became of Brian. How can I be sure the same won't happen to <player>? Anyone under the curse should leave for the good of our village!"

translation.key: [p]You affectionately ruffle Beebis's feathers; it is time to say goodbye. You have only spent a short amount of time together, but with Beebis by your side, you feel you aren't alone.
translation.value: [p]You affectionately ruffle Beebis's feathers; it is time to say goodbye. You have only spent a short amount of time together, but with Beebis by your side, you feel you aren't alone.

translation.key: [p]You tell her about Luther; he hopes that the fruit gathered from the Tanuki will solve Helonia's dilemma.
translation.value: [p]You tell her about Luther; he hopes that the fruit gathered from the Tanuki will solve Helonia's dilemma.

translation.key: "That Luther is a smart one. If Selena were half as mature as he is, I wouldn't have to worry so much." Madeline sighs heavily.
translation.value: "That Luther is a smart one. If Selena were half as mature as he is, I wouldn't have to worry so much." Madeline sighs heavily.

translation.key: [bot_36]Beebis seems tranquil, as though he is totally unaware of the tragedy that has taken place.
translation.value: [bot_36]Beebis seems tranquil, as though he is totally unaware of the tragedy that has taken place.

translation.key: [p]You shrug helplessly and inform Corey that you are considering looking for someone to help you. Somebody out there has to have a solution to your terrible dilemma.
translation.value: [p]You shrug helplessly and inform Corey that you are considering looking for someone to help you. Somebody out there has to have a solution to your terrible dilemma.

translation.key: "I see that the spirit has no intention of harming anyone. Perhaps, in time, it could become your companion." Corey smiles encouragingly at your Eidolon.
translation.value: "I see that the spirit has no intention of harming anyone. Perhaps, in time, it could become your companion." Corey smiles encouragingly at your Eidolon.

translation.key: "Take it easy, and be careful. Nothing too exciting ever happens in this tiny town. The world outside this place - well, now there's an adventure!"
translation.value: "Take it easy, and be careful. Nothing too exciting ever happens in this tiny town. The world outside this place - well, now there's an adventure!"

translation.key: "Have you met everyone you needed to meet? <player>, do you know where to go?" Sheila asks sorrowfully.
translation.value: "Have you met everyone you needed to meet? <player>, do you know where to go?" Sheila asks sorrowfully.

translation.key: [p]You nod, though you truly aren't sure. Maybe it would be better to go to a big city with lots of people to ask about the issue. Perhaps you'll find someone who knows how to separate the spirit from your body.
translation.value: [p]You nod, though you truly aren't sure. Maybe it would be better to go to a big city with lots of people to ask about the issue. Perhaps you'll find someone who knows how to separate the spirit from your body.

translation.key: "I don't know if this will help, but I once heard from a friend from Helonia about something called a Starlight Treasure Chest. Legend has it that an item within it can chase evil spirits away."
translation.value: "I don't know if this will help, but I once heard from a friend from Helonia about something called a Starlight Treasure Chest. Legend has it that an item within it can chase evil spirits away."

translation.key: [p]Upon hearing that, you brighten a bit. The Helonia Coast is located to the northwest of Port Skandia. You decide to go there and investigate.
translation.value: [p]Upon hearing that, you brighten a bit. The Helonia Coast is located to the northwest of Port Skandia. You decide to go there and investigate.

translation.key: "Once you get to the Helonia Coast look for a merchant named Luther. Tell him that you're looking for a Starlight Treasure Chest."
translation.value: "Once you get to the Helonia Coast look for a merchant named Luther. Tell him that you're looking for a Starlight Treasure Chest."

translation.key: [p]You nod. The news the Village Chief's wife gave you sparks new hope in your heart. Your journey now has a purpose.
translation.value: [p]You nod. The news the Village Chief's wife gave you sparks new hope in your heart. Your journey now has a purpose.

translation.key: "Did you pack all your things? You've got everything you need, right?" Sheila asks fretfully.
translation.value: "Did you pack all your things? You've got everything you need, right?" Sheila asks fretfully.

translation.key: "But before meeting with him, could you help me drive the Sunbirds out of here? They keep stealing our fruit!"
translation.value: "But before meeting with him, could you help me drive the Sunbirds out of here? They keep stealing our fruit!"

translation.key: [p]You sigh helplessly and allow the strange creature to follow you around. You have to focus on finding Brian; then you can figure out what to do with your strange possession situation.
translation.value: [p]You sigh helplessly and allow the strange creature to follow you around. You have to focus on finding Brian; then you can figure out what to do with your strange possession situation.

translation.key: Madeline still looks utterly puzzled. "Where did this fruit come from?"
translation.value: Madeline still looks utterly puzzled. "Where did this fruit come from?"

translation.key: [p]You tell Sheila that you feel much better now, and you prepare to hit the road.
translation.value: [p]You tell Sheila that you feel much better now, and you prepare to hit the road.

translation.key: "Silly child! You're one of us: a citizen of Skandia. And Beebis is your companion now. We couldn't possibly just let you two leave without a proper goodbye!"
translation.value: "Silly child! You're one of us: a citizen of Skandia. And Beebis is your companion now. We couldn't possibly just let you two leave without a proper goodbye!"

translation.key: "Go quickly! Don't keep everyone waiting."
translation.value: "Go quickly! Don't keep everyone waiting."

translation.key: "What do you want to buy? I can help you find it more quickly."
translation.value: "What do you want to buy? I can help you find it more quickly."

translation.key: "Welcome to Helonia. Are you here on business? Helonia's a wonderful place!"
translation.value: "Welcome to Helonia. Are you here on business? Helonia's a wonderful place!"

translation.key: [p]You politely introduce yourself to Luther and mention the Starlight Treasure Chest. You also explain what Sheila had said.
translation.value: [p]You politely introduce yourself to Luther and mention the Starlight Treasure Chest. You also explain what Sheila had said.

translation.key: "Sheila told you to look for me?" Luther scratches his head.
translation.value: "Sheila told you to look for me?" Luther scratches his head.

translation.key: "Well, I know about a Starlight Treasure Chest, but it's not mine. Madeline, Mayor of Helonia, has it."
translation.value: "Well, I know about a Starlight Treasure Chest, but it's not mine. Madeline, Mayor of Helonia, has it."

translation.key: Madeline paces tautly. She glances at you, but it is clear she doesn't want to talk.
translation.value: Madeline paces tautly. She glances at you, but it is clear she doesn't want to talk.

translation.key: "Luckily, we only lost one box of food," Larry grunts.
translation.value: "Luckily, we only lost one box of food," Larry grunts.

translation.key: "Why are you looking for Brian, too? Do you know him?"
translation.value: "Why are you looking for Brian, too? Do you know him?"

translation.key: [p]You shake your head fiercely. "I have an urgent issue, and I must speak to him to clear things up."
translation.value: [p]You shake your head fiercely. "I have an urgent issue, and I must speak to him to clear things up."

translation.key: "You really want to know where he is? He's as crazy as the day is long; he's been attacking residents! A couple beans short of a chili, if you know what I mean. If you want to investigate, you can talk to Larry, a traveling merchant. He's the person Brian most recently attacked."
translation.value: "You really want to know where he is? He's as crazy as the day is long; he's been attacking residents! A couple beans short of a chili, if you know what I mean. If you want to investigate, you can talk to Larry, a traveling merchant. He's the person Brian most recently attacked."

translation.key: [p]You take inventory of all your equipment and suddenly notice that Beebis has followed you the whole time.
translation.value: [p]You take inventory of all your equipment and suddenly notice that Beebis has followed you the whole time.

translation.key:
Sheila gives a frown only an irritated mother can give.

 "Also, ask them if they have seen my son, <bot_12>. I have no idea where he is."
translation.value:
Sheila gives a frown only an irritated mother can give.

 "Also, ask them if they have seen my son, <bot_12>. I have no idea where he is."

translation.key: "It means that a hero who will save the world will be born here. But it also says... the hero could become a demon that could destroy the very fabric of our universe."
translation.value: "It means that a hero who will save the world will be born here. But it also says... the hero could become a demon that could destroy the very fabric of our universe."

translation.key: "I'm sorry. I know it's not your fault. I just need to calm down." He sighs again.
translation.value: "I'm sorry. I know it's not your fault. I just need to calm down." He sighs again.

translation.key: [p]You see goods scattered about and wonder if you should help him with the investigation.
translation.value: [p]You see goods scattered about and wonder if you should help him with the investigation.

translation.key: "You still want to assist me? Could you just help me bring those scattered boxes over here? Please?"
translation.value: "You still want to assist me? Could you just help me bring those scattered boxes over here? Please?"

translation.key: You help shove the scattered crates back to Larry's side.
translation.value: You help shove the scattered crates back to Larry's side.

translation.key: "Good lord, <player>! You scared me to death! What are you doing here?!"
translation.value: "Good lord, <player>! You scared me to death! What are you doing here?!"

translation.key: Glad you're here to help. I couldn't move all this stuff on my own. I'm Larry, by the way, and I'm a traveling merchant." He sticks out his hand. You shake it gamely, then introduce yourself to him.
translation.value: Glad you're here to help. I couldn't move all this stuff on my own. I'm Larry, by the way, and I'm a traveling merchant." He sticks out his hand. You shake it gamely, then introduce yourself to him.

translation.key: "<player>, I'm afraid I need to ask you for another favor." Larry rummages through the scattered goods and fishes out a package.
translation.value: "<player>, I'm afraid I need to ask you for another favor." Larry rummages through the scattered goods and fishes out a package.

translation.key: "I'd like to ask you to send this package to my friend Bentley on my behalf. It's just some dried food he asked me to buy for him several days ago. Though the other items were destroyed, this will prevent him from going hungry, at least."
translation.value: "I'd like to ask you to send this package to my friend Bentley on my behalf. It's just some dried food he asked me to buy for him several days ago. Though the other items were destroyed, this will prevent him from going hungry, at least."

translation.key: "There's something in it for you, too. This friend of mine has been hunting here for ages, so he knows this forest like the back of his hand. Perhaps he can help you find Brian."
translation.value: "There's something in it for you, too. This friend of mine has been hunting here for ages, so he knows this forest like the back of his hand. Perhaps he can help you find Brian."

translation.key: "Well, what really happened to Brian," Bentley mutters, pressing down on a bleeding wound.
translation.value: "Well, what really happened to Brian," Bentley mutters, pressing down on a bleeding wound.

translation.key: [p]You hand the package to Bentley and explain why you've come. He winces as he listens to you; you quickly realize he has been badly injured.
translation.value: [p]You hand the package to Bentley and explain why you've come. He winces as he listens to you; you quickly realize he has been badly injured.

translation.key: "Beebis? Why is Elena's house ostrich here with you?" Bentley clutches his bleeding wound, staring into Beebis's beady eyes.
translation.value: "Beebis? Why is Elena's house ostrich here with you?" Bentley clutches his bleeding wound, staring into Beebis's beady eyes.

translation.key: [bot_36]Suddenly, Beebis snatches up a piece of fruit and gulps it down.
translation.value: [bot_36]Suddenly, Beebis snatches up a piece of fruit and gulps it down.

translation.key: "It's Brian. I just don't know what he's up to. I just saw him dragging a child deep into the forest. I approached him; I never thought he'd attack me so viciously."
translation.value: "It's Brian. I just don't know what he's up to. I just saw him dragging a child deep into the forest. I approached him; I never thought he'd attack me so viciously."

translation.key: [bot_36]Bentley grinds his teeth, clearly in immense pain. Beebis rests his feathered head on your shoulder as though he, too, is concerned.
translation.value: [bot_36]Bentley grinds his teeth, clearly in immense pain. Beebis rests his feathered head on your shoulder as though he, too, is concerned.

translation.key: "<player>, I've heard about your situation. What have you decided to do?"
translation.value: "<player>, I've heard about your situation. What have you decided to do?"

translation.key: "You want to take on that beastly thing? He dwells in the Ruins Cave not far from here, but you'd better be careful."
translation.value: "You want to take on that beastly thing? He dwells in the Ruins Cave not far from here, but you'd better be careful."

translation.key: [p]You nod and prepare to set out. Beebis trots behind you eagerly.
translation.value: [p]You nod and prepare to set out. Beebis trots behind you eagerly.

translation.key: "Beebis, come here. Don't get in <player>'s way!" Flower drags Beebis back.
translation.value: "Beebis, come here. Don't get in <player>'s way!" Flower drags Beebis back.

translation.key: "How annoying. The most important parts have flaked off. Who knows what was predicted here?"
translation.value: "How annoying. The most important parts have flaked off. Who knows what was predicted here?"

translation.key: "Beebis, stop following <player>. You're only causing trouble!" Flower shouts, frustrated.
translation.value: "Beebis, stop following <player>. You're only causing trouble!" Flower shouts, frustrated.

translation.key: [bot_36]Beebis takes a step back, then quickly catches back up with you.
translation.value: [bot_36]Beebis takes a step back, then quickly catches back up with you.

translation.key: [p]You hand everything you've found, including the Relic Fragments, Flower. You also give her the secret translation information.
translation.value: [p]You hand everything you've found, including the Relic Fragments, Flower. You also give her the secret translation information.

translation.key: "Well, at least we found most of the fragments. Let me see. This part should go here, and that one must be placed there..."
translation.value: "Well, at least we found most of the fragments. Let me see. This part should go here, and that one must be placed there..."

translation.key: "Ah, it fits together like a puzzle! I can finally decipher the message inscribed in the statue!" Flower claps gleefully.
translation.value: "Ah, it fits together like a puzzle! I can finally decipher the message inscribed in the statue!" Flower claps gleefully.

translation.key: [p]Your heart races anxiously; you ask Flower about the message on the stone statue.
translation.value: [p]Your heart races anxiously; you ask Flower about the message on the stone statue.

translation.key: "Do you really want to know?" Flower looks at you, eyes welling with anxiety and fear.
translation.value: "Do you really want to know?" Flower looks at you, eyes welling with anxiety and fear.

translation.key: "This is a pretty deep wound. I'm probably going to have to do something about it, eh?" Bentley winces.
translation.value: "This is a pretty deep wound. I'm probably going to have to do something about it, eh?" Bentley winces.

translation.key: [p]You explain why Beebis is following you, then inquire about Bentley's injuries.
translation.value: [p]You explain why Beebis is following you, then inquire about Bentley's injuries.

translation.key: [eidolon]"Hey! Stop that! That is your master's property," Snaps Alessa, moving the fruit out of Beebis's reach.
translation.value: [eidolon]"Hey! Stop that! That is your master's property," Snaps Alessa, moving the fruit out of Beebis's reach.

translation.key: "<player>, are you ready? I have some special magic I can try on that spirit. As for the result, well, we'll just have to wait and see."
translation.value: "<player>, are you ready? I have some special magic I can try on that spirit. As for the result, well, we'll just have to wait and see."

translation.key: "Brian's personality completely changed. He shattered everything in Elena's place and snapped her staff in two... I'm telling you this because you must stay vigilant."
translation.value: "Brian's personality completely changed. He shattered everything in Elena's place and snapped her staff in two... I'm telling you this because you must stay vigilant."

translation.key: "It's clear that Beebis doesn't see you as a dangerous person."
translation.value: "It's clear that Beebis doesn't see you as a dangerous person."

translation.key: [p]Worrying that you might end up like Brian, you tentatively ask what happened to him next.
translation.value: [p]Worrying that you might end up like Brian, you tentatively ask what happened to him next.

translation.key: "Brian fled to the forest. The village garrison is investigating this case right now. Maybe Garrison Member Willie will have some clues."
translation.value: "Brian fled to the forest. The village garrison is investigating this case right now. Maybe Garrison Member Willie will have some clues."

translation.key: [p]You nod, planning to ask Willie directly.
translation.value: [p]You nod, planning to ask Willie directly.

translation.key: [bot_36]When you turn to leave, Beebis grabs your sleeve with its beak and gently pulls you back.
translation.value: [bot_36]When you turn to leave, Beebis grabs your sleeve with its beak and gently pulls you back.

translation.key: "Hmm, <player>, it looks like you'll have to take Beebis with you. Perhaps he can serve as your mount for now. Elena won't mind if you take him out for a trip, I'm sure!"
translation.value: "Hmm, <player>, it looks like you'll have to take Beebis with you. Perhaps he can serve as your mount for now. Elena won't mind if you take him out for a trip, I'm sure!"

translation.key: "Even a small, quaint fishing village like this isn't really safe," Willie mutters sadly.
translation.value: "Even a small, quaint fishing village like this isn't really safe," Willie mutters sadly.

translation.key: "<player>, are you okay? It might feel a little uncomfortable, but it shouldn't be any worse than a light fever. A little grogginess shouldn't be a problem for you, right?"
translation.value: "<player>, are you okay? It might feel a little uncomfortable, but it shouldn't be any worse than a light fever. A little grogginess shouldn't be a problem for you, right?"

translation.key: "I will use teleportation magic to send you back to Port Skandia when you're ready. With Beebis' help, you shouldn't have too much trouble."
translation.value: "I will use teleportation magic to send you back to Port Skandia when you're ready. With Beebis' help, you shouldn't have too much trouble."

translation.key: "Have all three gems recovered their power? We've no time to lose. You should get this done as quickly as possible."
translation.value: "Have all three gems recovered their power? We've no time to lose. You should get this done as quickly as possible."

translation.key: [p]You return to Elena and give her the three gems, each practically vibrating with energy.
translation.value: [p]You return to Elena and give her the three gems, each practically vibrating with energy.

translation.key: [p]After Elena embeds the three gems in her staff, they begin to radiate dazzling rays of brilliant light.
translation.value: [p]After Elena embeds the three gems in her staff, they begin to radiate dazzling rays of brilliant light.

translation.key: "Ah, they've regained their power. Next, I will cast the exorcism spell on you. If it goes as planned, it will remove the Spirit that follows you."
translation.value: "Ah, they've regained their power. Next, I will cast the exorcism spell on you. If it goes as planned, it will remove the Spirit that follows you."

translation.key: "Wonderful!" Her expression lifts, then suddenly darkens.
translation.value: "Wonderful!" Her expression lifts, then suddenly darkens.

translation.key: "The pirates... they're here. I hope things go as planned," She murmurs, biting her lip.
translation.value: "The pirates... they're here. I hope things go as planned," She murmurs, biting her lip.

translation.key: Elena waves her wand and recites an incantation you have never heard before.
translation.value: Elena waves her wand and recites an incantation you have never heard before.

translation.key: [p]A warm mist fills the air. Elena's magic makes you feel as though you are floating, which makes sense, because when you open your eyes, you are hovering in midair.
translation.value: [p]A warm mist fills the air. Elena's magic makes you feel as though you are floating, which makes sense, because when you open your eyes, you are hovering in midair.

translation.key: [p]You try to relax as the winds whips around you, but you can't help but let out a small shriek of surprise.
translation.value: [p]You try to relax as the winds whips around you, but you can't help but let out a small shriek of surprise.

translation.key: "This is the Water Gem, Tree Gem, and Magic Gem. You should go to the Wharf, Logging Site, and Ruins with the corresponding gems."
translation.value: "This is the Water Gem, Tree Gem, and Magic Gem. You should go to the Wharf, Logging Site, and Ruins with the corresponding gems."

translation.key: "<player>?!"
translation.value: "<player>?!"

translation.key: Elena cries out when she sees the pain on your face and immediately stops reciting the incantation.
translation.value: Elena cries out when she sees the pain on your face and immediately stops reciting the incantation.

translation.key: The light of the spell extinguishes; you collapse to the ground in pain.
translation.value: The light of the spell extinguishes; you collapse to the ground in pain.

translation.key: [p]The spirit that had haunted you ominously changes its form into a creature you have never seen before.
translation.value: [p]The spirit that had haunted you ominously changes its form into a creature you have never seen before.

translation.key: [p]Willie and Elena's conversation makes you dizzy and you can hardly focus on their words. Trying to guide the subject away from the weird creature, you ask Willie where you can find Kane.
translation.value: [p]Willie and Elena's conversation makes you dizzy and you can hardly focus on their words. Trying to guide the subject away from the weird creature, you ask Willie where you can find Kane.

translation.key: "The Garrison Captain is currently in the north-eastern corner of the forest. Reports were saying that Brian was spotted hiding in a nearby cave."
translation.value: "The Garrison Captain is currently in the north-eastern corner of the forest. Reports were saying that Brian was spotted hiding in a nearby cave."

translation.key: "So... so I guess I'm done here. I, uh, gotta go then!"
translation.value: "So... so I guess I'm done here. I, uh, gotta go then!"

translation.key: [bot_42]"<player>, I think you should seek out Kane in a hurry. Here, let this ostrich take you there. Maybe we can figure out from Brian what kind of... creature this thing is."
translation.value: [bot_42]"<player>, I think you should seek out Kane in a hurry. Here, let this ostrich take you there. Maybe we can figure out from Brian what kind of... creature this thing is."

translation.key: [p]You nod and turn to go, yet the strange creature is following your every move!
translation.value: [p]You nod and turn to go, yet the strange creature is following your every move!

translation.key: "However, if it fails, and the spirit takes you over, I will have no choice but to use my magic to defeat you. Do you understand?"
translation.value: "However, if it fails, and the spirit takes you over, I will have no choice but to use my magic to defeat you. Do you understand?"

translation.key: "He and the panther ran into the house and attacked me, then broke my staff in two..."
translation.value: "He and the panther ran into the house and attacked me, then broke my staff in two..."

translation.key: "You know you have a Light Orb following you, right? Or am I hallucinating?"
translation.value: "You know you have a Light Orb following you, right? Or am I hallucinating?"

translation.key: "And, um, thank you. I apologize for my rudeness. I just have way too much on my mind."
translation.value: "And, um, thank you. I apologize for my rudeness. I just have way too much on my mind."

translation.key: "I'm gonna lend you this amulet. It's a token of friendship between Elena and I. Go to Elena's house with this, and I know she'll come up with a way to help you."
translation.value: "I'm gonna lend you this amulet. It's a token of friendship between Elena and I. Go to Elena's house with this, and I know she'll come up with a way to help you."

translation.key: "How will that fool help? I have a good friend who might be able to actually lend a hand." Bentley opens a small bag hanging around his waist. From inside the bag, he removes an amulet.
translation.value: "How will that fool help? I have a good friend who might be able to actually lend a hand." Bentley opens a small bag hanging around his waist. From inside the bag, he removes an amulet.

translation.key: [p]You explain to Bentley that you need to rid yourself of the spirit. However, you are still determined to find Brian and talk with him.
translation.value: [p]You explain to Bentley that you need to rid yourself of the spirit. However, you are still determined to find Brian and talk with him.

translation.key: [p]You feel utterly depressed after hearing that from Bentley. You both gaze at the Spirit warily. Beebis cocks his head, watching the Orb carefully.
translation.value: [p]You feel utterly depressed after hearing that from Bentley. You both gaze at the Spirit warily. Beebis cocks his head, watching the Orb carefully.

translation.key: "<player>, thank you. I feel much better..." Bentley nods weakly.
translation.value: "<player>, thank you. I feel much better..." Bentley nods weakly.

translation.key: Bentley quickly mixes two liquids and applies the viscous solution to his laceration. The endless bleeding from the wound begins to slow. The pained look fades from Bentley's face.
translation.value: Bentley quickly mixes two liquids and applies the viscous solution to his laceration. The endless bleeding from the wound begins to slow. The pained look fades from Bentley's face.

translation.key: "Gasp... gasp... cough, cough!"
translation.value: "Gasp... gasp... cough, cough!"

translation.key: "Beebis, follow <player>." Bentley swallows hard, hiding his pain badly, and shoos you and Beebis away.
translation.value: "Beebis, follow <player>." Bentley swallows hard, hiding his pain badly, and shoos you and Beebis away.

translation.key: "A bunch of Grass Sprouts reside in the forest. The slime they produce can stop the bleeding and help the wound heal. Please collect some slime and fluid from the sprouts."
translation.value: "A bunch of Grass Sprouts reside in the forest. The slime they produce can stop the bleeding and help the wound heal. Please collect some slime and fluid from the sprouts."

translation.key: [p]You inspect the festering wound with concern, then ask Bentley what you can do to help him.
translation.value: [p]You inspect the festering wound with concern, then ask Bentley what you can do to help him.

translation.key: [p]You quickly explain that you need her help, handing her the amulet from Bentley.
translation.value: [p]You quickly explain that you need her help, handing her the amulet from Bentley.

translation.key: "Stop! You take one step forward, and you'll be sorry!" Fire flashes through Elena's eyes as she prepares to cast magic, but her demeanor immediately softens when she sees the spirit next to you... and her beloved Beebis.
translation.value: "Stop! You take one step forward, and you'll be sorry!" Fire flashes through Elena's eyes as she prepares to cast magic, but her demeanor immediately softens when she sees the spirit next to you... and her beloved Beebis.

translation.key: "You... you have a spirit. That boy Brian, he had one, too," Elena recalls coldly. "At first, I wanted to help him, but his spirit transformed into a sinister black panther."
translation.value: "You... you have a spirit. That boy Brian, he had one, too," Elena recalls coldly. "At first, I wanted to help him, but his spirit transformed into a sinister black panther."

translation.key: "You're willing to help? Excellent! I don't think Braeden has it in him to catch the birds anyway."
translation.value: "You're willing to help? Excellent! I don't think Braeden has it in him to catch the birds anyway."

translation.key: [bot_36]Beebis quietly follows behind you.
translation.value: [bot_36]Beebis quietly follows behind you.

translation.key: Elena stares at you, suspiciously, before her gaze shifts to Bentley's token.
translation.value: Elena stares at you, suspiciously, before her gaze shifts to Bentley's token.

translation.key: "It's a real surprise. Beebis -- who is usually quite anxious around strangers -- seems to have a certain fondness for you. You must not be very dangerous." Elena arches an eyebrow, analyzing you.
translation.value: "It's a real surprise. Beebis -- who is usually quite anxious around strangers -- seems to have a certain fondness for you. You must not be very dangerous." Elena arches an eyebrow, analyzing you.

translation.key: [p]Sensing that she is softening toward you, you ask Elena if she can help you remove the spirit following you.
translation.value: [p]Sensing that she is softening toward you, you ask Elena if she can help you remove the spirit following you.

translation.key: "Any friend of Bentley's is a friend of mine. However, you are going to have to help me fix my staff before I can cast any such spell."
translation.value: "Any friend of Bentley's is a friend of mine. However, you are going to have to help me fix my staff before I can cast any such spell."

translation.key: "The staff lost all its energy when Brian attacked me. I need your help. You must help me power it up again." Elena removes three brightly colored gems from a bag.
translation.value: "The staff lost all its energy when Brian attacked me. I need your help. You must help me power it up again." Elena removes three brightly colored gems from a bag.

translation.key: [p]The people in your dream seem powerful and important, not at all like the people you know at the small fishing village. How did the dream end? You long to find out...
translation.value: [p]The people in your dream seem powerful and important, not at all like the people you know at the small fishing village. How did the dream end? You long to find out...

translation.key: "That was really close, but I've got everything I need." Braeden smiles, flushed.
translation.value: "That was really close, but I've got everything I need." Braeden smiles, flushed.

translation.key: "Can you help me get these items into town? The mayor will be happy to see 'em," Braeden grunts.
translation.value: "Can you help me get these items into town? The mayor will be happy to see 'em," Braeden grunts.

translation.key: "I still have to go to my brother's place to get new fishing nets, and I've gotta make sure he's still in the dark about our plans. If you're ready, go ahead. I don't want to give the pirates a reason to start trouble."
translation.value: "I still have to go to my brother's place to get new fishing nets, and I've gotta make sure he's still in the dark about our plans. If you're ready, go ahead. I don't want to give the pirates a reason to start trouble."

translation.key: "We're missing Braeden's items. I can't believe he's not here yet!"
translation.value: "We're missing Braeden's items. I can't believe he's not here yet!"

translation.key: [p]You place the box full of supplies next to the Town Mayor, explaining that these are the items Braeden is supposed to collect. Everything is accounted for within the box.
translation.value: [p]You place the box full of supplies next to the Town Mayor, explaining that these are the items Braeden is supposed to collect. Everything is accounted for within the box.

translation.key: [bot_43]"Please take me with you, you'll need my help!"
translation.value: [bot_43]"Please take me with you, you'll need my help!"

translation.key: "There's nothing wrong with the content deciphered by Flower. So why on earth would the creator choose a small, insignificant place like Skandia?"
translation.value: "There's nothing wrong with the content deciphered by Flower. So why on earth would the creator choose a small, insignificant place like Skandia?"

translation.key: "I'm still not sure what to do. I could get the materials needed to make a new net in the forest, but I've heard that the pirates frequent that area and tend to attack anyone who goes in alone."
translation.value: "I'm still not sure what to do. I could get the materials needed to make a new net in the forest, but I've heard that the pirates frequent that area and tend to attack anyone who goes in alone."

translation.key: [p]The nightmare fatigues you greatly, your thoughts fractured and sluggish. You're relieved that the terrible dream was only just that, but you regret not being able to see it to its end.
translation.value: [p]The nightmare fatigues you greatly, your thoughts fractured and sluggish. You're relieved that the terrible dream was only just that, but you regret not being able to see it to its end.

translation.key: "I'm lucky to have your help - and my brother's too. You caught those dastardly birds a lot faster than I could've. Heck, even if I had a few days, I'm not sure I'd be able to catch 'em."
translation.value: "I'm lucky to have your help - and my brother's too. You caught those dastardly birds a lot faster than I could've. Heck, even if I had a few days, I'm not sure I'd be able to catch 'em."

translation.key: <player>, are you zoning out? I thought you said you were supposed to deliver some goods to <bot_10>. You're an official garrison member; I shouldn't need to remind you to do your job!
translation.value: <player>, are you zoning out? I thought you said you were supposed to deliver some goods to <bot_10>. You're an official garrison member; I shouldn't need to remind you to do your job!

translation.key: I like you a lot; don't let me down. The boss wants to discuss something with me, so go ahead and meed with the Chief's Wife.
translation.value: I like you a lot; don't let me down. The boss wants to discuss something with me, so go ahead and meed with the Chief's Wife.

translation.key: [p]You are not sure why or when you fell asleep. Yesterday, you agreed to deliver some merchandise to the Chief's Wife. It looks as though you've missed the delivery; you have to apologize to her.
translation.value: [p]You are not sure why or when you fell asleep. Yesterday, you agreed to deliver some merchandise to the Chief's Wife. It looks as though you've missed the delivery; you have to apologize to her.

translation.key: "I understand how you feel, but the Town Mayor doesn't have time to solve your problem." Luther shrugs passively.
translation.value: "I understand how you feel, but the Town Mayor doesn't have time to solve your problem." Luther shrugs passively.

translation.key: [p]Panic crosses your face. You ask Luther why the mayor can't help.
translation.value: [p]Panic crosses your face. You ask Luther why the mayor can't help.

translation.key: "Not long ago, the Catseye Pirate Crew threatened the Town Mayor and demanded protection money. If she didn't pay up, they told her all of Helonia would suffer."
translation.value: "Not long ago, the Catseye Pirate Crew threatened the Town Mayor and demanded protection money. If she didn't pay up, they told her all of Helonia would suffer."

translation.key: "The deadline to pay them off is approaching, and we're still missing half the goods. The Mayor is scrambling to solve this crisis."
translation.value: "The deadline to pay them off is approaching, and we're still missing half the goods. The Mayor is scrambling to solve this crisis."

translation.key: "Hey, if it's really urgent, go and talk to her. The worst thing she can say is 'no.'"
translation.value: "Hey, if it's really urgent, go and talk to her. The worst thing she can say is 'no.'"

translation.key: "If you need a Starlight Treasure Chest, you should look for the Town Mayor, Madeline. I cannot do it for you."
translation.value: "If you need a Starlight Treasure Chest, you should look for the Town Mayor, Madeline. I cannot do it for you."

translation.key: I think you look better this way.{OR}Quit being such a baby! I’ve seen worse.{OR}I keep asking for wine, but all <bot_34> gives me are mugs of ale.
translation.value: I think you look better this way.{OR}Quit being such a baby! I’ve seen worse.{OR}I keep asking for wine, but all <bot_34> gives me are mugs of ale.

translation.key: [p]You anxiously stop Isaac in his tracks and tell him you'll help Braeden catch the parrots.
translation.value: [p]You anxiously stop Isaac in his tracks and tell him you'll help Braeden catch the parrots.

translation.key: [p]Noticing Isaac's hesitation, you ask him to tell you more.
translation.value: [p]Noticing Isaac's hesitation, you ask him to tell you more.

translation.key: "While fishing, I accidentally caught a stone in my net, and it totally shredded the mesh. I need that net! Without it, my livelihood is all but destroyed."
translation.value: "While fishing, I accidentally caught a stone in my net, and it totally shredded the mesh. I need that net! Without it, my livelihood is all but destroyed."

translation.key: I think you look better this way.{OR}Quit being such a baby! I’ve seen worse.{OR}I keep asking for wine, but all <bot_7> gives me are mugs of ale.
translation.value: I think you look better this way.{OR}Quit being such a baby! I’ve seen worse.{OR}I keep asking for wine, but all <bot_7> gives me are mugs of ale.

translation.key: [p]You ask Isaac what kinds of items he needs for the net, offering to help collect them.
translation.value: [p]You ask Isaac what kinds of items he needs for the net, offering to help collect them.

translation.key:
"That would be fantastic! You can get high-quality Thin Vines from the Spirit and Dryads in the Helonia Woods (Azuria). The vines can be woven into excellent nets.
Thin Vine you can craft."
translation.value:
"That would be fantastic! You can get high-quality Thin Vines from the Spirit and Dryads in the Helonia Woods (Azuria). The vines can be woven into excellent nets.
Thin Vine you can craft."

translation.key: "My foolish brother! I wonder if he took my words to heart. He needs to focus on fishing, not provoking pirates."
translation.value: "My foolish brother! I wonder if he took my words to heart. He needs to focus on fishing, not provoking pirates."

translation.key: [p]You hand all the Thin Vines to Isaac.
translation.value: [p]You hand all the Thin Vines to Isaac.

translation.key: "Wow, look at all of these!" he exclaims, clearly pleased.
translation.value: "Wow, look at all of these!" he exclaims, clearly pleased.

translation.key: "Even without the whole pirate issue, it would've taken Braeden and I much longer to collect the Thin Vines."
translation.value: "Even without the whole pirate issue, it would've taken Braeden and I much longer to collect the Thin Vines."

translation.key: "Thank you so much."
translation.value: "Thank you so much."

translation.key: "Before I leave, I must tell my brother something."
translation.value: "Before I leave, I must tell my brother something."

translation.key: Logging Site
translation.value: Logging Site

translation.key: "I fear that even Braeden collected so many Thin Vines, he doesn't have the parrots the pirates are after... and I've still got the cages."
translation.value: "I fear that even Braeden collected so many Thin Vines, he doesn't have the parrots the pirates are after... and I've still got the cages."

translation.key: "Pirates love parrots. What are you gonna do?" Isaac shrugs.
translation.value: "Pirates love parrots. What are you gonna do?" Isaac shrugs.

translation.key: "I got to make sure he remembers, or everything he's done up to this point will be for naught."
translation.value: "I got to make sure he remembers, or everything he's done up to this point will be for naught."

translation.key: [p]You are momentarily taken aback. If Isaac finds Braeden, he'll definitely learn about the counterattack plan. Casually, you ask why he needs to find his brothers.
translation.value: [p]You are momentarily taken aback. If Isaac finds Braeden, he'll definitely learn about the counterattack plan. Casually, you ask why he needs to find his brothers.

translation.key: "Don't be afraid, son. Hush. Daddy's here. It will all be alright." York glances at you with unease. Will it really be okay?
translation.value: "Don't be afraid, son. Hush. Daddy's here. It will all be alright." York glances at you with unease. Will it really be okay?

translation.key: "<player>, I owe you big time... But, um, could you tell us exactly what happened?"
translation.value: "<player>, I owe you big time... But, um, could you tell us exactly what happened?"

translation.key: Armor for Tank.
translation.value: Armor for Tank.

translation.key: "Go to Helonia Woods. Catch the parrots. We fishermen mostly focus on, you know, fishing, so the pirates' request isn't an easy one for us. And the parrots aren't exactly the friendliest birds ever..."
translation.value: "Go to Helonia Woods. Catch the parrots. We fishermen mostly focus on, you know, fishing, so the pirates' request isn't an easy one for us. And the parrots aren't exactly the friendliest birds ever..."

translation.key: "Don't let a little mistake ruin the whole counterattack plan."
translation.value: "Don't let a little mistake ruin the whole counterattack plan."

translation.key: "I feel like I'm forgetting something... eh, I'm sure it wasn't that important."
translation.value: "I feel like I'm forgetting something... eh, I'm sure it wasn't that important."

translation.key: [p]You give Braeden the Wild Parrots and tell him what Isaac has said.
translation.value: [p]You give Braeden the Wild Parrots and tell him what Isaac has said.

translation.key: "I knew I was forgetting something! I nearly let a bunch of stupid birds ruin the whole plan!" Braeden groans, pulling at his hair.
translation.value: "I knew I was forgetting something! I nearly let a bunch of stupid birds ruin the whole plan!" Braeden groans, pulling at his hair.

translation.key: Gun DMG
translation.value: Gun DMG

translation.key: Shotgun DMG
translation.value: Shotgun DMG

translation.key: Grenade DMG
translation.value: Grenade DMG

translation.key: Rifle DMG
translation.value: Rifle DMG

translation.key: Lucky Drop
translation.value: Lucky Drop

translation.key: Eidolon PWR
translation.value: Eidolon PWR

translation.key: Otohime
translation.value: Otohime

translation.key: "He firmly believed he was cursed by an evil spell, so he wanted to ask Elena for help. But the next day..."
translation.value: "He firmly believed he was cursed by an evil spell, so he wanted to ask Elena for help. But the next day..."

translation.key: "Just you wait, you filthy pirates! You won't trifle with the good people of Helonia again!" Braeden exclaims.
translation.value: "Just you wait, you filthy pirates! You won't trifle with the good people of Helonia again!" Braeden exclaims.

translation.key: "The hut containing the fish is in the southern section of the eastern coast. Don't underestimate those Sun Crabs, though. Their pincers can snap straight through human bone."
translation.value: "The hut containing the fish is in the southern section of the eastern coast. Don't underestimate those Sun Crabs, though. Their pincers can snap straight through human bone."

translation.key: Ammo
