translation.key: "After we get the catch back, we need to take inventory and add it to the payment. I don't want to give even one extra fish to those thieving cads."
translation.value: "After we get the catch back, we need to take inventory and add it to the payment. I don't want to give even one extra fish to those thieving cads."

translation.key: "You know what? You're right. I didn't think of that. We can't just blatantly resist them."
translation.value: "You know what? You're right. I didn't think of that. We can't just blatantly resist them."

translation.key: "I'll prepare the supplies for the pirates, but I have a few tricks up my sleeve."
translation.value: "I'll prepare the supplies for the pirates, but I have a few tricks up my sleeve."

translation.key: [p]You nod, but insist that the entire town still needs to fully prepare if they hope to fight back.
translation.value: [p]You nod, but insist that the entire town still needs to fully prepare if they hope to fight back.

translation.key: "You know, I just met you, but I think we're gonna get along just fine." Braeden grins.
translation.value: "You know, I just met you, but I think we're gonna get along just fine." Braeden grins.

translation.key: "Count me in. I've got some ideas on how to take down the pirates. I'll prepare all the supplies before executing the plan.
translation.value: "Count me in. I've got some ideas on how to take down the pirates. I'll prepare all the supplies before executing the plan.

translation.key: "I'll take all the fish that we've caught recently to a nearby hut. Add that to the fish stock, and we should meet the quota."
translation.value: "I'll take all the fish that we've caught recently to a nearby hut. Add that to the fish stock, and we should meet the quota."

translation.key: "It won't be so easy to get the fish to the pirates, though." Braeden bites his lips, thinking.
translation.value: "It won't be so easy to get the fish to the pirates, though." Braeden bites his lips, thinking.

translation.key: "The pirates' activity has forced Sun Crabs to gather near town. One of 'em is larger and stronger than the rest. The townsfolk call him Mobray the Giant Crab."
translation.value: "The pirates' activity has forced Sun Crabs to gather near town. One of 'em is larger and stronger than the rest. The townsfolk call him Mobray the Giant Crab."

translation.key: "Unfortunately, the crabs are converging on the very place where I put all the fish."
translation.value: "Unfortunately, the crabs are converging on the very place where I put all the fish."

translation.key: [p]You tell Braeden that you will help him fend off the Crabs and bring back the catch.
translation.value: [p]You tell Braeden that you will help him fend off the Crabs and bring back the catch.

translation.key: Vampirism
translation.value: Vampirism

translation.key: They just never shut up! I'm begging you. Please get rid of them; I've had a migraine for months!"
translation.value: They just never shut up! I'm begging you. Please get rid of them; I've had a migraine for months!"

translation.key: "The fish are stored in a hut south of the eastern coast. but watch out for the blasted Sun Crabs."
translation.value: "The fish are stored in a hut south of the eastern coast. but watch out for the blasted Sun Crabs."

translation.key: [p]Braeden grins widely as you present the catch to him.
translation.value: [p]Braeden grins widely as you present the catch to him.

translation.key: "I saw what you did on the coast!" Braeden crows, his eyes full of awe.
translation.value: "I saw what you did on the coast!" Braeden crows, his eyes full of awe.

translation.key: "I've never seen someone with such skill. Every last Sun Crab scampered away, terrified. You even defeated Mobray!"
translation.value: "I've never seen someone with such skill. Every last Sun Crab scampered away, terrified. You even defeated Mobray!"

translation.key: "I had no idea you had such battle prowess. You could teach me a thing or two, partner."
translation.value: "I had no idea you had such battle prowess. You could teach me a thing or two, partner."

translation.key: "We'll prepare the supplies and carry out our plans against the Pirates simultaneously, so listen close."
translation.value: "We'll prepare the supplies and carry out our plans against the Pirates simultaneously, so listen close."

translation.key: "I plan to lead the entire band of pirates to an open area, then use gunpowder to blast 'em to high heaven in one fell swoop."
translation.value: "I plan to lead the entire band of pirates to an open area, then use gunpowder to blast 'em to high heaven in one fell swoop."

translation.key: "I've already told others in town, and we've a good deal of gunpowder. We need to refine the powder to transform it into a powerful bomb."
translation.value: "I've already told others in town, and we've a good deal of gunpowder. We need to refine the powder to transform it into a powerful bomb."

translation.key: [p]You ask how you can help.
translation.value: [p]You ask how you can help.

translation.key: "We need this bomb to do some serious damage. Will you help collect materials for the bomb's outer casing?"
translation.value: "We need this bomb to do some serious damage. Will you help collect materials for the bomb's outer casing?"

translation.key: Luther releases a long sigh. "The people here just want to live in peace. If they can solve the problem by throwing money at it, that's what they'll do."
translation.value: Luther releases a long sigh. "The people here just want to live in peace. If they can solve the problem by throwing money at it, that's what they'll do."

translation.key: [p]You ask Madeline if there is some way you can help.
translation.value: [p]You ask Madeline if there is some way you can help.

translation.key: Madeline sighs again and shakes her head. "I just have to keep calm, even in the face of the pirates. If I panic, everyone else will, too."
translation.value: Madeline sighs again and shakes her head. "I just have to keep calm, even in the face of the pirates. If I panic, everyone else will, too."

translation.key: "My daughter Selena and I are fighting, too. We exchanged words, and she just up and left. I haven't heard from her since. I can't help but worry about her!"
translation.value: "My daughter Selena and I are fighting, too. We exchanged words, and she just up and left. I haven't heard from her since. I can't help but worry about her!"

translation.key: <player>, would you like to try working at the Logging Site? The salary's not bad.
translation.value: <player>, would you like to try working at the Logging Site? The salary's not bad.

translation.key: "I've considered the options carefully, but the best place for our plan is at the beach right in front of us."
translation.value: "I've considered the options carefully, but the best place for our plan is at the beach right in front of us."

translation.key: "I'll consider what you said, but I must deal with the pirates first. Find Luther if you need something."
translation.value: "I'll consider what you said, but I must deal with the pirates first. Find Luther if you need something."

translation.key: "The Tanuki outside the village are growing more rambunctious by the day. The Town Mayor is about to lose her mind. She must be under so much pressure. I wish Selena were a bit more understanding."
translation.value: "The Tanuki outside the village are growing more rambunctious by the day. The Town Mayor is about to lose her mind. She must be under so much pressure. I wish Selena were a bit more understanding."

translation.key: You explain to Luther that you've already driven off the Tanuki, then you tell him what the Town Mayor said.
translation.value: You explain to Luther that you've already driven off the Tanuki, then you tell him what the Town Mayor said.

translation.key: "Thank you for your hard work, <player>. The Town Mayor said she might consider your Starlight Treasure Chest request. That's a huge win for you!"
translation.value: "Thank you for your hard work, <player>. The Town Mayor said she might consider your Starlight Treasure Chest request. That's a huge win for you!"

translation.key: "When I'm done helping the Town Mayor inventory the supplies, I'll go looking for Selena. For now, I'm sure the Mayor just appreciates the quiet."
translation.value: "When I'm done helping the Town Mayor inventory the supplies, I'll go looking for Selena. For now, I'm sure the Mayor just appreciates the quiet."

translation.key: [p]You ask Luther why the townsfolk don't just band together to resist the Pirates.
translation.value: [p]You ask Luther why the townsfolk don't just band together to resist the Pirates.

translation.key: "Collect some of the nearby Fruit. Once we soak and dry 'em, we can use them as shrapnel. That'll give our bomb some extra punch."
translation.value: "Collect some of the nearby Fruit. Once we soak and dry 'em, we can use them as shrapnel. That'll give our bomb some extra punch."

translation.key: "But not everyone shares this viewpoint. If I remember correctly, the younger of the Fisherman Brothers, Braeden, doesn't want to hand over the cash or goods."
translation.value: "But not everyone shares this viewpoint. If I remember correctly, the younger of the Fisherman Brothers, Braeden, doesn't want to hand over the cash or goods."

translation.key: "Perhaps you can find his older brother, Isaac, and speak to him. Maybe you can come up with a way to convince Braeden. We could really use Braeden's help collecting supplies."
translation.value: "Perhaps you can find his older brother, Isaac, and speak to him. Maybe you can come up with a way to convince Braeden. We could really use Braeden's help collecting supplies."

translation.key: [p]You relay Luther's words to Isaac and explain that you want to convince Braeden to hand over the goods.
translation.value: [p]You relay Luther's words to Isaac and explain that you want to convince Braeden to hand over the goods.

translation.key: "I'm worried about Braeden. His refusal to hand over the supplies might provoke the pirates." Isaac sighs.
translation.value: "I'm worried about Braeden. His refusal to hand over the supplies might provoke the pirates." Isaac sighs.

translation.key: "My brother won't listen to me. There will always be more fish to catch; a few trout aren't worth his life. He just doesn't understand."
translation.value: "My brother won't listen to me. There will always be more fish to catch; a few trout aren't worth his life. He just doesn't understand."

translation.key: "Well, I guess since you're willing to convince him, it's worth a try."
translation.value: "Well, I guess since you're willing to convince him, it's worth a try."

translation.key: "Can I help you?"
translation.value: "Can I help you?"

translation.key: "I can't think clearly lately. The Tanuki outside the town squawk and squeak constantly.
translation.value: "I can't think clearly lately. The Tanuki outside the town squawk and squeak constantly.

translation.key: "Okay, I'll dry out the Cleaned Fruit, then fill them with gunpowder. These will teach those cads a lesson they won't soon forget."
translation.value: "Okay, I'll dry out the Cleaned Fruit, then fill them with gunpowder. These will teach those cads a lesson they won't soon forget."

translation.key: "Let me tell you something. I won't be threatened. I won't give those pirates a dime!" Braeden seethes.
translation.value: "Let me tell you something. I won't be threatened. I won't give those pirates a dime!" Braeden seethes.

translation.key: [p]You tell Braeden that you agree, but resisting will only alert the pirates to your plan.
translation.value: [p]You tell Braeden that you agree, but resisting will only alert the pirates to your plan.

translation.key: [p]You pass a flyer to an elderly townsman.
translation.value: [p]You pass a flyer to an elderly townsman.

translation.key: "Ah, but I digress! Worry not; your work will not be in vain. These bombs will make the pirates run for the hills."
translation.value: "Ah, but I digress! Worry not; your work will not be in vain. These bombs will make the pirates run for the hills."

translation.key: "Now onto the next step of my plan," Braeden exclaims.
translation.value: "Now onto the next step of my plan," Braeden exclaims.

translation.key: "There's no time to lose!" Braeden brings out a few sheets of paper and begins scrawling on them.
translation.value: "There's no time to lose!" Braeden brings out a few sheets of paper and begins scrawling on them.

translation.key: "This is the beginning of the next step of my plan. We should distribute these flyers to the townspeople. We've got to incite the anger in them; they hate those dastardly pirates, but they're too afraid to fight back. Appeal to the townsfolk to stand together against the pirates."
translation.value: "This is the beginning of the next step of my plan. We should distribute these flyers to the townspeople. We've got to incite the anger in them; they hate those dastardly pirates, but they're too afraid to fight back. Appeal to the townsfolk to stand together against the pirates."

translation.key: "Take these flyers and distribute them. Make sure that you don't lose them; they took me a long time to print up. I just know they'll get a good reaction out of the townsfolk."
translation.value: "Take these flyers and distribute them. Make sure that you don't lose them; they took me a long time to print up. I just know they'll get a good reaction out of the townsfolk."

translation.key: [p]You tell Braeden that you will distribute the flyers, but you aren't sure if the townspeople will pass on the information as he hopes.
translation.value: [p]You tell Braeden that you will distribute the flyers, but you aren't sure if the townspeople will pass on the information as he hopes.

translation.key: "It shouldn't be a problem. Everyone loves some good gossip. We need as many people to fight against the pirates as possible. However, I'm worried that my older brother will try to stop us when he hears the plan."
translation.value: "It shouldn't be a problem. Everyone loves some good gossip. We need as many people to fight against the pirates as possible. However, I'm worried that my older brother will try to stop us when he hears the plan."

translation.key: "I think I'm getting an idea. After you've handed out the flyers, seek out my brother and find out if he's wise to our plan."
translation.value: "I think I'm getting an idea. After you've handed out the flyers, seek out my brother and find out if he's wise to our plan."

translation.key: "<player>, I'm glad we can agree. It's not worth ordinary folk like us making enemies out of the pirates, who knows what they'll do if they're provoked."
translation.value: "<player>, I'm glad we can agree. It's not worth ordinary folk like us making enemies out of the pirates, who knows what they'll do if they're provoked."

translation.key: "Hold on, what are those papers you're holding? Do you need some help?"
translation.value: "Hold on, what are those papers you're holding? Do you need some help?"

translation.key: [p]You dismiss the offer of help with a wave of your hand. Looks like you'll have to distribute the flyers before getting any information out of Isaac.
translation.value: [p]You dismiss the offer of help with a wave of your hand. Looks like you'll have to distribute the flyers before getting any information out of Isaac.

translation.key: "I just wish my brother could join the fight. Unfortunately, he just doesn't get it, so I have to hide my plans from him." Braeden bites his lip and looks into the distance with a sad expression.
translation.value: "I just wish my brother could join the fight. Unfortunately, he just doesn't get it, so I have to hide my plans from him." Braeden bites his lip and looks into the distance with a sad expression.

translation.key: "You are quite skilled. Nice attention to detail. Good job!" Braeden gives you the thumbs up as he carefully looks over the bombs.
translation.value: "You are quite skilled. Nice attention to detail. Good job!" Braeden gives you the thumbs up as he carefully looks over the bombs.

translation.key: [p]You pass a flyer to a young man.
translation.value: [p]You pass a flyer to a young man.

translation.key: He reads it with surprise, then smiles.
translation.value: He reads it with surprise, then smiles.

translation.key: "Finally, someone's taking some action around here! We've put up with those pirates for far too long!"
translation.value: "Finally, someone's taking some action around here! We've put up with those pirates for far too long!"

translation.key: "You can count on my help. And my friends will be on your side, too." The Helonian Man grins, excitement in his eyes.
translation.value: "You can count on my help. And my friends will be on your side, too." The Helonian Man grins, excitement in his eyes.

translation.key: [p]You shove a flyer into the hands of a middle-aged man.
translation.value: [p]You shove a flyer into the hands of a middle-aged man.

translation.key: "Don't go looking for problems! I have a wife and kid at home. I'm not going to pick a fight with a pirate, you fool!" Clearly agitated, the man crumples the flyer into a ball.
translation.value: "Don't go looking for problems! I have a wife and kid at home. I'm not going to pick a fight with a pirate, you fool!" Clearly agitated, the man crumples the flyer into a ball.

translation.key: "Get out of here! Don't come near my house again. I will have no part in your foolish plan!" He throws the paper to the ground, furious.
translation.value: "Get out of here! Don't come near my house again. I will have no part in your foolish plan!" He throws the paper to the ground, furious.

translation.key: "We all know those pirates are vicious cads, but we're just normal people. We're not experts like you, <player>. We shouldn't start trouble."
translation.value: "We all know those pirates are vicious cads, but we're just normal people. We're not experts like you, <player>. We shouldn't start trouble."

translation.key: "Speaking of which, I really must thank you. I've heard that, thanks to you, Braeden will hand over the supplies. I couldn't persuade him no matter how hard I tried."
translation.value: "Speaking of which, I really must thank you. I've heard that, thanks to you, Braeden will hand over the supplies. I couldn't persuade him no matter how hard I tried."

translation.key: "We've gotta use the secretions to keep the gunpowder dry. Please help me collect the secretions of the Forest Beetles. I'll do my best to finish my current task by the time you get back."
translation.value: "We've gotta use the secretions to keep the gunpowder dry. Please help me collect the secretions of the Forest Beetles. I'll do my best to finish my current task by the time you get back."

translation.key: "I'll stay here and work on dividing up the gunpowder. We don't have a lot of time to prepare, so it's best if we divide and conquer!"
translation.value: "I'll stay here and work on dividing up the gunpowder. We don't have a lot of time to prepare, so it's best if we divide and conquer!"

translation.key: "We don't have much time. You must quickly find the Fruit. We can't do anything without 'em," Braeden urges eagerly.
translation.value: "We don't have much time. You must quickly find the Fruit. We can't do anything without 'em," Braeden urges eagerly.

translation.key: "Now go soak them, but you have to do it right, contact Craftsman for that, he will help you."
translation.value: "Now go soak them, but you have to do it right, contact Craftsman for that, he will help you."

translation.key: [p]You hand the sopping wet Cleaned Fruit to Braeden.
translation.value: [p]You hand the sopping wet Cleaned Fruit to Braeden.

translation.key: He raises a white eyebrow and reads the paper. "I fully support fighting the pirates. I once got in a tussle with them in a pub when I was younger. I wasn't afraid of them then, and I'm certainly not afraid of them now!"
translation.value: He raises a white eyebrow and reads the paper. "I fully support fighting the pirates. I once got in a tussle with them in a pub when I was younger. I wasn't afraid of them then, and I'm certainly not afraid of them now!"

translation.key: Lately, numerous <bot_20>hops have migrated to the Logging Site. The naughty troublemakers make a mess all day long. Workmen complain constantly about picking up their, er, 'jelly beans.'
translation.value: Lately, numerous <bot_20>hops have migrated to the Logging Site. The naughty troublemakers make a mess all day long. Workmen complain constantly about picking up their, er, 'jelly beans.'

translation.key: "If we want to set our bombs on the beach, I need you to help prepare some waterproof paint."
translation.value: "If we want to set our bombs on the beach, I need you to help prepare some waterproof paint."

translation.key: [p]You anxiously ask Braeden to be more specific.
translation.value: [p]You anxiously ask Braeden to be more specific.

translation.key: "West of Helonia, you'll find Helonia Woods. Forest Beetles live there, and their gooey bodily secretions cause water to bead up. The goo is used as a sealant on many ships."
translation.value: "West of Helonia, you'll find Helonia Woods. Forest Beetles live there, and their gooey bodily secretions cause water to bead up. The goo is used as a sealant on many ships."

translation.key: "The mist and fog are thick around the coast. If those bombs aren't waterproof, it could compromise the whole plan."
translation.value: "The mist and fog are thick around the coast. If those bombs aren't waterproof, it could compromise the whole plan."

translation.key: [p]It sounds like the first choice would be much quicker. You ask Flower where you could find the Ruins Giant.
translation.value: [p]It sounds like the first choice would be much quicker. You ask Flower where you could find the Ruins Giant.

translation.key: "I've got to think everything through and lay out the plans completely. Maybe if I present the townsfolk with concrete ideas, I can tap into their suppressed rage toward the pirates," Braeden contemplates, pacing.
translation.value: "I've got to think everything through and lay out the plans completely. Maybe if I present the townsfolk with concrete ideas, I can tap into their suppressed rage toward the pirates," Braeden contemplates, pacing.

translation.key: "Oh! You've brought a lot of Insect Fluid! Quick, let me take a look." Braeden snatches the vial of Insect Fluid out of your hands before you have a chance to respond.
translation.value: "Oh! You've brought a lot of Insect Fluid! Quick, let me take a look." Braeden snatches the vial of Insect Fluid out of your hands before you have a chance to respond.

translation.key: "I'm almost done with my work here. Let me think about what to do next..."
translation.value: "I'm almost done with my work here. Let me think about what to do next..."

translation.key: Braeden busily tinkers with the Insect Body Fluid, using a delicate brush to seal the Cleaned Fruit.
translation.value: Braeden busily tinkers with the Insect Body Fluid, using a delicate brush to seal the Cleaned Fruit.

translation.key: [P]It appears that Braeden has already poured the gunpowder into the Cleaned Fruit peels. The bombs are almost fully prepared.
translation.value: [P]It appears that Braeden has already poured the gunpowder into the Cleaned Fruit peels. The bombs are almost fully prepared.

translation.key: "I know you're anxious to help out. I could use an extra set of hands to apply this sealant." Braeden lips stretch into a smirk.
translation.value: "I know you're anxious to help out. I could use an extra set of hands to apply this sealant." Braeden lips stretch into a smirk.

translation.key: "Just apply the bug fluids to the peels of the Cleaned Fruit, and the bombshells will be complete!"
translation.value: "Just apply the bug fluids to the peels of the Cleaned Fruit, and the bombshells will be complete!"

translation.key:
"Make sure you don't let the paint leak onto any part of the bomb, or we'll end up with a bunch of duds."

You need a Craftstman!
translation.value:
"Make sure you don't let the paint leak onto any part of the bomb, or we'll end up with a bunch of duds."

You need a Craftstman!

translation.key: [p]Braeden flashes a big grin when you hand him the sealed bombs.
translation.value: [p]Braeden flashes a big grin when you hand him the sealed bombs.

translation.key: [p]You explain to Braeden why you have come, but he seems increasingly annoyed.
translation.value: [p]You explain to Braeden why you have come, but he seems increasingly annoyed.

translation.key: "Your apology is quite sincere. I forgive you. And I do have another task," <bot_10> says with a kind smile.
translation.value: "Your apology is quite sincere. I forgive you. And I do have another task," <bot_10> says with a kind smile.

translation.key: You'll find a good deal of wood in the area. I need you to carry it to me.
translation.value: You'll find a good deal of wood in the area. I need you to carry it to me.

translation.key: You must help me finish off today's work if you want your proper salary.
translation.value: You must help me finish off today's work if you want your proper salary.

translation.key:
"It's about time to send the chopped wood back to the village"

Caine explains, scanning the sky.
translation.value:
"It's about time to send the chopped wood back to the village"

Caine explains, scanning the sky.

translation.key: This was originally <bot_19>'s job, but I think you ought to take his place. You're more responsible than he ever was. Go to the Garrison Captain. I will speak to him.
translation.value: This was originally <bot_19>'s job, but I think you ought to take his place. You're more responsible than he ever was. Go to the Garrison Captain. I will speak to him.

translation.key:
"Not bad for a newbie."

 <bot_18> is clearly satisfied by the reduced number of <bot_20>hops.
translation.value:
"Not bad for a newbie."

 <bot_18> is clearly satisfied by the reduced number of <bot_20>hops.

translation.key:
"We have three days to deliver to the furniture shop. We cannot be late."

 <bot_18> snaps, scanning a list.
translation.value:
"We have three days to deliver to the furniture shop. We cannot be late."

 <bot_18> snaps, scanning a list.

translation.key: I've a task for you. Drive the <bot_20>hops out of the Logging Site so the lumberjacks can focus on their work!
translation.value: I've a task for you. Drive the <bot_20>hops out of the Logging Site so the lumberjacks can focus on their work!

translation.key: We cannot let those rascally rabbits slow us down. If the wood is not delivered to the village fast enough, construction there will be delayed.
translation.value: We cannot let those rascally rabbits slow us down. If the wood is not delivered to the village fast enough, construction there will be delayed.

translation.key: <bot_22> typically pile up the chopped wood under another tree. Take a walk around the Logging Site. It shouldn't be hard to find the wood.
translation.value: <bot_22> typically pile up the chopped wood under another tree. Take a walk around the Logging Site. It shouldn't be hard to find the wood.

translation.key: Well, there's no time to lose. you should just start working right away.
translation.value: Well, there's no time to lose. you should just start working right away.

translation.key: [p]You shake your head and explain that you don't know him.
translation.value: [p]You shake your head and explain that you don't know him.

translation.key: Speaking of which, have you seen <bot_19> lately? He hasn't come to work in days!
translation.value: Speaking of which, have you seen <bot_19> lately? He hasn't come to work in days!

translation.key: Did <bot_16> ask you to come here? Excellent. I was just wondering what the Garrison Members in the village normally do during the day. They just hang about the forest. They might as well be here doing something productive for once.
translation.value: Did <bot_16> ask you to come here? Excellent. I was just wondering what the Garrison Members in the village normally do during the day. They just hang about the forest. They might as well be here doing something productive for once.

translation.key:
"This boy <bot_19> is a fool! He only makes work harder for me! Unless we're short workers, I'd fire him right away!"

 <bot_18> grumbles to himself. It seems that working at the Logging Site is quite arduous.
translation.value:
"This boy <bot_19> is a fool! He only makes work harder for me! Unless we're short workers, I'd fire him right away!"

 <bot_18> grumbles to himself. It seems that working at the Logging Site is quite arduous.

translation.key: [bot_22]I was just taking a break. I didn't know I was going to fall asleep. It's not a big deal.
translation.value: [bot_22]I was just taking a break. I didn't know I was going to fall asleep. It's not a big deal.

translation.key: You move pretty fast. What about the others?
translation.value: You move pretty fast. What about the others?

translation.key: What are those <bot_21> doing now? It's late, and they haven't brought the wood back yet.
translation.value: What are those <bot_21> doing now? It's late, and they haven't brought the wood back yet.

translation.key: <player>, everyone says I'm too harsh. I suppose you can judge for yourself now. Only you have returned with the wood. What are all the others doing out there, picking each other's noses?
translation.value: <player>, everyone says I'm too harsh. I suppose you can judge for yourself now. Only you have returned with the wood. What are all the others doing out there, picking each other's noses?

translation.key: I've heard of rebellions, but <bot_12> has gone too far. It's late, and he hasn't come home yet. I fear he's getting spoiled, and we can't have that! He needs to learn a lesson.
translation.value: I've heard of rebellions, but <bot_12> has gone too far. It's late, and he hasn't come home yet. I fear he's getting spoiled, and we can't have that! He needs to learn a lesson.

translation.key: [p]You started to wake up the <bot_21>.
translation.value: [p]You started to wake up the <bot_21>.

translation.key: I'm awake, don't touch me.
translation.value: I'm awake, don't touch me.

translation.key: These lazy fools are becoming more and more arrogant. It's time they take a pay cut! I doubt they'll dare slack off on the job again.
translation.value: These lazy fools are becoming more and more arrogant. It's time they take a pay cut! I doubt they'll dare slack off on the job again.

translation.key: As for your work... well, I really don't have much for you to do.
translation.value: As for your work... well, I really don't have much for you to do.

translation.key: [p]You pass the collected lumber to Caine.
translation.value: [p]You pass the collected lumber to Caine.

translation.key: Not much of an excuse, you lazy fool! You only get half a day's pay today. End of discussion!
translation.value: Not much of an excuse, you lazy fool! You only get half a day's pay today. End of discussion!

translation.key: [bot_22]You're such a scrooge! Everyone needs a nap now and again!
translation.value: [bot_22]You're such a scrooge! Everyone needs a nap now and again!

translation.key: "If you argue again, I'll take away your breaks," <bot_18> growls, glaring.
translation.value: "If you argue again, I'll take away your breaks," <bot_18> growls, glaring.

translation.key: [bot_22]Fine, fine. I know I made a mistake. I won't do it again.
translation.value: [bot_22]Fine, fine. I know I made a mistake. I won't do it again.

translation.key: <player>, you have impressed me. I think I can recommend <bot_23> to you, you can make more money with it than working at the <world_1>.
translation.value: <player>, you have impressed me. I think I can recommend <bot_23> to you, you can make more money with it than working at the <world_1>.

translation.key: [p]You nervously explain to <bot_18> that you know nothing about medicine, and you don't want to be a burden to the doctor.
translation.value: [p]You nervously explain to <bot_18> that you know nothing about medicine, and you don't want to be a burden to the doctor.

translation.key: Oh, c'mon. It can't be that hard! You only go to school for, what, eleven, twelve years to become a doctor? No biggie. Just look at it as a learning experience.
translation.value: Oh, c'mon. It can't be that hard! You only go to school for, what, eleven, twelve years to become a doctor? No biggie. Just look at it as a learning experience.

translation.key: See for yourself. <player>, who started working here just today, has contributed more to our project in one day than you have in your career. Shame on you!
translation.value: See for yourself. <player>, who started working here just today, has contributed more to our project in one day than you have in your career. Shame on you!

translation.key: From now on, everyone will treat you as an adult. Perhaps you'll travel the world, meeting maharajas and princesses. Or maybe you'll just live and work in this fishing port all your life. You know, either way.
translation.value: From now on, everyone will treat you as an adult. Perhaps you'll travel the world, meeting maharajas and princesses. Or maybe you'll just live and work in this fishing port all your life. You know, either way.

translation.key: I saw him yesterday, but not today.
translation.value: I saw him yesterday, but not today.

translation.key: [p]You ask <bot_14> if she has seen <bot_12>.
translation.value: [p]You ask <bot_14> if she has seen <bot_12>.

translation.key: Well, let's forget about the jam. Why don't you treat yourself to some new armor? Being a garrison member in a fishing village is not exactly a dangerous job, but from time to time, you'll need to clear out some monsters, and you'll be happy to have steel between their claws and your heart!
translation.value: Well, let's forget about the jam. Why don't you treat yourself to some new armor? Being a garrison member in a fishing village is not exactly a dangerous job, but from time to time, you'll need to clear out some monsters, and you'll be happy to have steel between their claws and your heart!

translation.key:
"Wait, I clearly told <bot_13> that I don't want any jam. It's too sweet. I like my jam salty and sour!"

 <bot_14> huffs.
translation.value:
"Wait, I clearly told <bot_13> that I don't want any jam. It's too sweet. I like my jam salty and sour!"

 <bot_14> huffs.

translation.key:
"<player>, would you like to buy a piece of <item_28>? We carry the armor in all sizes, and we... what is this?"

 <bot_14> takes the jar of jam and examines it suspiciously.
translation.value:
"<player>, would you like to buy a piece of <item_28>? We carry the armor in all sizes, and we... what is this?"

 <bot_14> takes the jar of jam and examines it suspiciously.

translation.key: <bot_12> didn't come to the marketplace today. It's a bit odd; he usually stops by.
translation.value: <bot_12> didn't come to the marketplace today. It's a bit odd; he usually stops by.

translation.key: [p]You ask <bot_13> if she has seen <bot_12>.
translation.value: [p]You ask <bot_13> if she has seen <bot_12>.

translation.key: Just remember this: in the outside world, you can buy different potions at various drugstores. You might find some other special items there, too.
translation.value: Just remember this: in the outside world, you can buy different potions at various drugstores. You might find some other special items there, too.

translation.key:
"Jam! At last! My toast has been going naked!"

 <bot_15> pops open the jar, dips in his fingers, and slurps up the jelly eagerly.
translation.value:
"Jam! At last! My toast has been going naked!"

 <bot_15> pops open the jar, dips in his fingers, and slurps up the jelly eagerly.

translation.key: This is so unusual. So you're helping <bot_10> deliver goods today? I suppose you are indeed a real garrison member. Keep up the good work.
translation.value: This is so unusual. So you're helping <bot_10> deliver goods today? I suppose you are indeed a real garrison member. Keep up the good work.

translation.key:
"Take this hammer and search the site for anyone sleeping on the job. Give 'em a wake up call they won't forget!"

 <bot_18> snarls, his face flushed with fury.
translation.value:
"Take this hammer and search the site for anyone sleeping on the job. Give 'em a wake up call they won't forget!"

 <bot_18> snarls, his face flushed with fury.

translation.key: To begin with, approach <bot_14>. She has something for you that will help your task.
translation.value: To begin with, approach <bot_14>. She has something for you that will help your task.

translation.key: I'm going to officially name you as my assistant. When the time is right, I'll teach you everything I know! I bet you're a fast learner!
translation.value: I'm going to officially name you as my assistant. When the time is right, I'll teach you everything I know! I bet you're a fast learner!

translation.key: *<bot_23> crows happily.*
translation.value: *<bot_23> crows happily.*

translation.key: Did any of the merchants see <bot_12>?
translation.value: Did any of the merchants see <bot_12>?

translation.key: These boxes of jam just arrived from the port. Please help me deliver them to the merchants in the village.
translation.value: These boxes of jam just arrived from the port. Please help me deliver them to the merchants in the village.

translation.key: [p]You apologize to <bot_10> and ask if there is a way to make it up to her.
translation.value: [p]You apologize to <bot_10> and ask if there is a way to make it up to her.

translation.key:
"<player>, have you forgotten your promise already?"

 Sheila asks with a gentle smile.
translation.value:
"<player>, have you forgotten your promise already?"

 Sheila asks with a gentle smile.

translation.key: It is now getting late. <player>, this boy is so...
translation.value: It is now getting late. <player>, this boy is so...

translation.key:
"Hasn't anyone seen <bot_12>? Where has that boy gone?"

 <bot_10> glances around anxiously.
translation.value:
"Hasn't anyone seen <bot_12>? Where has that boy gone?"

 <bot_10> glances around anxiously.

translation.key:
"<bot_10> dotes on him. She spoils him. He can play alone once in a while, you know? Who knows, he might grow up to be a great conqueror - if he stops being so darn soft!"

 <bot_16> chortles.
translation.value:
"<bot_10> dotes on him. She spoils him. He can play alone once in a while, you know? Who knows, he might grow up to be a great conqueror - if he stops being so darn soft!"

 <bot_16> chortles.

translation.key: <player>, do you have any questions? I'm sorry, can't help you.
translation.value: <player>, do you have any questions? I'm sorry, can't help you.

translation.key: <player>, where is my wife, and why are you delivering my lunch?
translation.value: <player>, where is my wife, and why are you delivering my lunch?

translation.key:
"Got it. The monster population in the forest has skyrocketed, too. Things are getting rough around here."

 <bot_16> looks over at you, eyeing the <item_30>.
translation.value:
"Got it. The monster population in the forest has skyrocketed, too. Things are getting rough around here."

 <bot_16> looks over at you, eyeing the <item_30>.

translation.key: <bot_16> frowns, pacing anxiously as he chats with <bot_17>, the lighthouse manager.
translation.value: <bot_16> frowns, pacing anxiously as he chats with <bot_17>, the lighthouse manager.

translation.key: [bot_17]I must report to you, as you are the Village Chief. The sea has begun to churn; the situation grows more unstable by the day. I can only guide the ships into the port with light signals, but...
translation.value: [bot_17]I must report to you, as you are the Village Chief. The sea has begun to churn; the situation grows more unstable by the day. I can only guide the ships into the port with light signals, but...

translation.key: I ought to go look for him. Could you bring this <item_30> to my husband, <bot_16>? When you see him, ask him to find you a suitable job.
translation.value: I ought to go look for him. Could you bring this <item_30> to my husband, <bot_16>? When you see him, ask him to find you a suitable job.

translation.key: [bot_42]"Kane, how could you say such a thing?!"
translation.value: [bot_42]"Kane, how could you say such a thing?!"

translation.key: "I suppose you're right. I have two choices. I can defeat the Ruins Giant that stole the translation information... Or I can spend a few days retranslating the ancient spells in Navea."
translation.value: "I suppose you're right. I have two choices. I can defeat the Ruins Giant that stole the translation information... Or I can spend a few days retranslating the ancient spells in Navea."

translation.key: [p]You shake your head and tell her that none of the merchants have seen him today. Hearing this, <bot_10>'s irritation starts to turn to worry.
translation.value: [p]You shake your head and tell her that none of the merchants have seen him today. Hearing this, <bot_10>'s irritation starts to turn to worry.

translation.key: [p]You find small mounds all around the place. Broken pieces of slate are buried beneath them. You report your findings to Flower.
translation.value: [p]You find small mounds all around the place. Broken pieces of slate are buried beneath them. You report your findings to Flower.

translation.key:
"Have you delivered the jam? You've truly grown; it's time for you to start saving your money."

 <bot_10> places some gleaming coins in your palm and closes your fingers around them.
translation.value:
"Have you delivered the jam? You've truly grown; it's time for you to start saving your money."

 <bot_10> places some gleaming coins in your palm and closes your fingers around them.

translation.key: <bot_12>? No, I haven't seen him today.
translation.value: <bot_12>? No, I haven't seen him today.

translation.key: [p]You ask <bot_15> if he has seen <bot_12>.
translation.value: [p]You ask <bot_15> if he has seen <bot_12>.

translation.key: I'll give you a tip, jelly kid. When you have time, just visit weapon shops in different places. You might find exceptionally good weaponry at reasonable prices!
translation.value: I'll give you a tip, jelly kid. When you have time, just visit weapon shops in different places. You might find exceptionally good weaponry at reasonable prices!

translation.key: Impressive, right? These weapons all come from abroad! This one here, for instance, is the <item_3>, a symbol of power. And over there is the <item_5>.
translation.value: Impressive, right? These weapons all come from abroad! This one here, for instance, is the <item_3>, a symbol of power. And over there is the <item_5>.

translation.key:
"Mmm! <bot_13> was right. The jam is perfectly sweet and tart. Would you like some? I promise my fingers are clean."

 <bot_15> follows your gaze to the newly produced weapons.
translation.value:
"Mmm! <bot_13> was right. The jam is perfectly sweet and tart. Would you like some? I promise my fingers are clean."

 <bot_15> follows your gaze to the newly produced weapons.

translation.key: I don't understand. I've never seen anyone react this way to my medicine. A possible allergy... no... impossible! I'm just as interested in finding out what's going on as you are!
translation.value: I don't understand. I've never seen anyone react this way to my medicine. A possible allergy... no... impossible! I'm just as interested in finding out what's going on as you are!

translation.key: [p]Hearing that the same thing had happened to Flower sparks hope in your heart. However, you notice that she is focused on the machine in your hands.
translation.value: [p]Hearing that the same thing had happened to Flower sparks hope in your heart. However, you notice that she is focused on the machine in your hands.

translation.key: "If I can help you, I'm more than willing to do so. I've seen something like this before. There was a spirit - a Light Orb - following me, but..."
translation.value: "If I can help you, I'm more than willing to do so. I've seen something like this before. There was a spirit - a Light Orb - following me, but..."

translation.key: [p]You tell Flower everything that happened and beg for assistance.
translation.value: [p]You tell Flower everything that happened and beg for assistance.

translation.key: "You, too..." <bot_33> murmurs to herself as she stares at the Light Orb.
translation.value: "You, too..." <bot_33> murmurs to herself as she stares at the Light Orb.

translation.key: [p]You appear in front of <bot_33>. The look on her face betrays an overwhelming sense of horror.
translation.value: [p]You appear in front of <bot_33>. The look on her face betrays an overwhelming sense of horror.

translation.key:
"He can't have gone too far..."

 She hangs her head, looking despondently at the <item_30> in her hand.
translation.value:
"He can't have gone too far..."

 She hangs her head, looking despondently at the <item_30> in her hand.

translation.key: I didn't forget. But working for <bot_18> is no picnic. Very few are willing to work backbreaking hours at the Logging Site, and <bot_18>'s not exactly Mr. Personality.
translation.value: I didn't forget. But working for <bot_18> is no picnic. Very few are willing to work backbreaking hours at the Logging Site, and <bot_18>'s not exactly Mr. Personality.

translation.key: [bot_17]<bot_16>, you said you needed someone to replace one of <bot_18>'s... less enthusiastic workers. How could you forget so quickly?
translation.value: [bot_17]<bot_16>, you said you needed someone to replace one of <bot_18>'s... less enthusiastic workers. How could you forget so quickly?

translation.key: [p]Well.
translation.value: [p]Well.

translation.key: All I can say is, <player>, um... don't worry... Just get yourself to the Statue Ruins right away. There, you'll find the Witch's Assistant, <bot_33>. Perhaps she can help.
translation.value: All I can say is, <player>, um... don't worry... Just get yourself to the Statue Ruins right away. There, you'll find the Witch's Assistant, <bot_33>. Perhaps she can help.

translation.key: [p]A moment of awkward silence passes, and then... <bot_23> -- thinking carefully -- lets out a long breath.
translation.value: [p]A moment of awkward silence passes, and then... <bot_23> -- thinking carefully -- lets out a long breath.

translation.key: "Something happened a while ago. Elena needed me to decipher the Runic letters on the statue. She said it was urgent, but she never explained why. However, her request has proven excessively difficult. The first time I translated the spell, it was stolen. Now the Fairies nearby won't let me anywhere near the Stone Statue."
translation.value: "Something happened a while ago. Elena needed me to decipher the Runic letters on the statue. She said it was urgent, but she never explained why. However, her request has proven excessively difficult. The first time I translated the spell, it was stolen. Now the Fairies nearby won't let me anywhere near the Stone Statue."

translation.key: This... is just a bottle of <item_45>. It couldn't do something like this...
translation.value: This... is just a bottle of <item_45>. It couldn't do something like this...

translation.key: [p]As you speak, the Blue Light Orb appears as though it's listening to what you have to say, hanging onto every word, as it dances around you.
translation.value: [p]As you speak, the Blue Light Orb appears as though it's listening to what you have to say, hanging onto every word, as it dances around you.

translation.key: [p]You immediately ask <bot_23> what's going on.
translation.value: [p]You immediately ask <bot_23> what's going on.

translation.key: [p]You turn and see a Light Orb floating next to you. It emits a faint blue light. You have a feeling that's what was causing you to feel ill...
translation.value: [p]You turn and see a Light Orb floating next to you. It emits a faint blue light. You have a feeling that's what was causing you to feel ill...

translation.key: "Something's appeared next to you. And, um, it's getting brighter..." <bot_23> tries his best to mask it, but you can tell he is worried.
translation.value: "Something's appeared next to you. And, um, it's getting brighter..." <bot_23> tries his best to mask it, but you can tell he is worried.

translation.key: [p]You take deep breaths to try to feel better, which seems to help. You start to feel lighter. As you fill your lungs with what... seems like more than just air.
translation.value: [p]You take deep breaths to try to feel better, which seems to help. You start to feel lighter. As you fill your lungs with what... seems like more than just air.

translation.key: Hey, <player>, what's wrong with you? Maybe we ought to induce vomiting...
translation.value: Hey, <player>, what's wrong with you? Maybe we ought to induce vomiting...

translation.key: [p]While Village <bot_23> is checking up on you, you start feeling nauseous.
translation.value: [p]While Village <bot_23> is checking up on you, you start feeling nauseous.

translation.key: [bot_36]Flower calls out again, but Beebis pays no attention. It continues pacing around you.
translation.value: [bot_36]Flower calls out again, but Beebis pays no attention. It continues pacing around you.

translation.key: Haha, each of those lazy lumberjacks comes to me with the same complaints. Seems like this <bot_18> guy is pretty strict.
translation.value: Haha, each of those lazy lumberjacks comes to me with the same complaints. Seems like this <bot_18> guy is pretty strict.

translation.key: [p]You ask Flower what she plans to do about the ancient spell translations. Even if you collect all of the shards, she still might not be able to decipher them.
translation.value: [p]You ask Flower what she plans to do about the ancient spell translations. Even if you collect all of the shards, she still might not be able to decipher them.

translation.key: "Wow! Some fragments of the ruins must be buried under these mounds. Hurry; help me dig. The most important information is carved on these fragments."
translation.value: "Wow! Some fragments of the ruins must be buried under these mounds. Hurry; help me dig. The most important information is carved on these fragments."

translation.key: You need blood from <bot_24>s to make the refreshing medicine. Nothing's more invigorating than animal blood, am I right?
translation.value: You need blood from <bot_24>s to make the refreshing medicine. Nothing's more invigorating than animal blood, am I right?

translation.key: "This is useless! There is no translation book for ancient spells. I can't possibly decipher all these. Heck, these runes aren't even complete! Some of them are mostly worn off."
translation.value: "This is useless! There is no translation book for ancient spells. I can't possibly decipher all these. Heck, these runes aren't even complete! Some of them are mostly worn off."

translation.key: [bot_36]Beebis continues to stay by your side, watching your every move. It seems very interested in the Light Orb.
translation.value: [bot_36]Beebis continues to stay by your side, watching your every move. It seems very interested in the Light Orb.

translation.key: [p]You peer at the runes as Flower taps her feet impatiently.
translation.value: [p]You peer at the runes as Flower taps her feet impatiently.

translation.key: "Ugh, forget it. I have far more important things to do." Flower sighs, giving up on Beebis. She returns to studying the runes on the Stone Statue.
translation.value: "Ugh, forget it. I have far more important things to do." Flower sighs, giving up on Beebis. She returns to studying the runes on the Stone Statue.

translation.key: Hello, <player>, how are you?
translation.value: Hello, <player>, how are you?

translation.key: "This is Beebis, one of Elena's ostriches. He's a bit shy..."
translation.value: "This is Beebis, one of Elena's ostriches. He's a bit shy..."

translation.key: "Hey, Beebis, come!" Flower tries to pull the ostrich closer, but it ambles away toward you.
translation.value: "Hey, Beebis, come!" Flower tries to pull the ostrich closer, but it ambles away toward you.

translation.key: [p]For a moment, you have no idea how to react.
translation.value: [p]For a moment, you have no idea how to react.

translation.key: [p]Just as you are about to speak, a black shadow suddenly races over to you. Both you and Flower shriek in surprise.
translation.value: [p]Just as you are about to speak, a black shadow suddenly races over to you. Both you and Flower shriek in surprise.

translation.key: "I'm so glad you're here to help! Otherwise, I'd never be able to decipher these runes."
translation.value: "I'm so glad you're here to help! Otherwise, I'd never be able to decipher these runes."

translation.key: [p]You tell Flower that you have cleared away the Fairies.
translation.value: [p]You tell Flower that you have cleared away the Fairies.

translation.key: "These are all old runic letters, but whoever etched them upon the stone probably didn't want others to decipher his message easily. This must be the reason..."
translation.value: "These are all old runic letters, but whoever etched them upon the stone probably didn't want others to decipher his message easily. This must be the reason..."

translation.key: "First, I need you to help me get rid of those pesky Petal Fairies and Green Fairies. Only then can I freely search for clues about the stone statue."
translation.value: "First, I need you to help me get rid of those pesky Petal Fairies and Green Fairies. Only then can I freely search for clues about the stone statue."

translation.key: You and the other lumberjacks need something - some sort of medicine to refresh your minds and bodies. Something to put some pep back in your step.
translation.value: You and the other lumberjacks need something - some sort of medicine to refresh your minds and bodies. Something to put some pep back in your step.

translation.key: Oh yes, I was just waiting for you. <bot_23> asked me to give you this.
translation.value: Oh yes, I was just waiting for you. <bot_23> asked me to give you this.

translation.key:
"You are truly an excellent assistant," 

<bot_23> comments, patting you on the back.
translation.value:
"You are truly an excellent assistant," 

<bot_23> comments, patting you on the back.

translation.key: I need you to prepare some <item_32> for me. You can find <bot_24> nearby.
translation.value: I need you to prepare some <item_32> for me. You can find <bot_24> nearby.

translation.key: What?! that medicine shouldn't have had any side effects. Let me take a closer look.
translation.value: What?! that medicine shouldn't have had any side effects. Let me take a closer look.

translation.key: This should be a simple task for someone like you. Here, take this; it'll get your blood flowing.
translation.value: This should be a simple task for someone like you. Here, take this; it'll get your blood flowing.

translation.key: I heard <bot_18> sent you here to help out. Luckily, I've got the perfect project for you.
translation.value: I heard <bot_18> sent you here to help out. Luckily, I've got the perfect project for you.

translation.key: [p]*You consider his reasoning, but it doesn't quite make sense. You explain to <bot_23> that perhaps your continuous nightmares have kept you from getting a proper night's sleep.*
translation.value: [p]*You consider his reasoning, but it doesn't quite make sense. You explain to <bot_23> that perhaps your continuous nightmares have kept you from getting a proper night's sleep.*

translation.key: At the moment, I can't find any physical problems. Maybe you're overworked; that can affect your brain, you know. You've got the same symptoms as the other workmen.
translation.value: At the moment, I can't find any physical problems. Maybe you're overworked; that can affect your brain, you know. You've got the same symptoms as the other workmen.

translation.key: <bot_18> sent you to me, I know.
translation.value: <bot_18> sent you to me, I know.

translation.key: Mm, okay.
translation.value: Mm, okay.

translation.key: [p]*You tell him how you're feeling today*
translation.value: [p]*You tell him how you're feeling today*

translation.key: Why do you feel dizzy? Could you be allergic to the medicine? Here, look. How many fingers am I holding up?
translation.value: Why do you feel dizzy? Could you be allergic to the medicine? Here, look. How many fingers am I holding up?

translation.key: "Originally, there was some sort of connection between these Runic letters. I don't know why I didn't think about that before," <bot_33> muses, her head in her hands.
translation.value: "Originally, there was some sort of connection between these Runic letters. I don't know why I didn't think about that before," <bot_33> muses, her head in her hands.

translation.key: I don't know why, but apparently he wants you to get all kinds of herbs for him.
translation.value: I don't know why, but apparently he wants you to get all kinds of herbs for him.

translation.key: [p]Something strange is happening to your body. You can feel the potion pumping through your every vein, and you also feel rather nauseous. You quickly explain your symptoms to <bot_23>.
translation.value: [p]Something strange is happening to your body. You can feel the potion pumping through your every vein, and you also feel rather nauseous. You quickly explain your symptoms to <bot_23>.

translation.key: "Drink it up. It's the only way you'll have the energy to work tomorrow," <bot_23> says with a grin.
translation.value: "Drink it up. It's the only way you'll have the energy to work tomorrow," <bot_23> says with a grin.

translation.key: [p]*You present <bot_23> with the <item_32> you collected.*
translation.value: [p]*You present <bot_23> with the <item_32> you collected.*

translation.key: Oh this <item_45>, a useful thing. At least for 3 days it will be easier.
translation.value: Oh this <item_45>, a useful thing. At least for 3 days it will be easier.

translation.key:
"I've almost completely ground up these herbs. We should put some <item_33>s into the medicine and grind them together, too..." 

<bot_23> suddenly pauses to examine the medicine.
translation.value:
"I've almost completely ground up these herbs. We should put some <item_33>s into the medicine and grind them together, too..." 

<bot_23> suddenly pauses to examine the medicine.

translation.key:
"I used up the mushrooms last time I prepared a medication. I haven't had time to seek them out again." 

<bot_23> scratches his head, anxious.
translation.value:
"I used up the mushrooms last time I prepared a medication. I haven't had time to seek them out again." 

<bot_23> scratches his head, anxious.

translation.key:
<player>, looks like I need to ask you to go gather some <item_33>s. They typically grow near tree trunks. Take a look around the area, and I'm sure you'll find 'em.

(You can find the location of ores, loot, and mobs in the Wiki tab in the voting).
translation.value:
<player>, looks like I need to ask you to go gather some <item_33>s. They typically grow near tree trunks. Take a look around the area, and I'm sure you'll find 'em.

(You can find the location of ores, loot, and mobs in the Wiki tab in the voting).

translation.key: These mushrooms may well be Skandia's most valuable resource. A good deal of caravans come to the port just to buy them. I hear they are also excellent in risotto.
translation.value: These mushrooms may well be Skandia's most valuable resource. A good deal of caravans come to the port just to buy them. I hear they are also excellent in risotto.

translation.key: [p]<bot_23> grins when you hand him the <item_33>s.
translation.value: [p]<bot_23> grins when you hand him the <item_33>s.

translation.key:
"Perfect! These are Skandia's most unique mushrooms." 

<bot_23> examines them out one by one.
translation.value:
"Perfect! These are Skandia's most unique mushrooms." 

<bot_23> examines them out one by one.

translation.key: I'll let you try this bottle of <item_45>. Trust me, it'll make you feel better.
translation.value: I'll let you try this bottle of <item_45>. Trust me, it'll make you feel better.

translation.key: Wait until your mind stabilizes, then please send the potion to the lumberjacks.
translation.value: Wait until your mind stabilizes, then please send the potion to the lumberjacks.

translation.key: [p]<bot_23> asked me to give this to you
translation.value: [p]<bot_23> asked me to give this to you

translation.key: Braeden stares at you a moment, thinking.
translation.value: Braeden stares at you a moment, thinking.

translation.key: We used to have Aliya as an herbalist. I'm relying on you.
translation.value: We used to have Aliya as an herbalist. I'm relying on you.

translation.key: Good! Put them together and give 'em a good grind. Then mix in this medicine, bottle it, and we're done! Easy, eh?
translation.value: Good! Put them together and give 'em a good grind. Then mix in this medicine, bottle it, and we're done! Easy, eh?
